  shows "U‚á©f $$ (0,1) = f(0)" and "U‚á©f $$ (1,0) = f(0)"
    and "U‚á©f $$(2,3) = f(1)" and "U‚á©f $$ (3,2) = f(1)"
    and "U‚á©f $$ (0,0) = 1 - f(0)" and "U‚á©f $$(1,1) = 1 - f(0)"
    and "U‚á©f $$ (2,2) = 1 - f(1)" and "U‚á©f $$ (3,3) = 1 - f(1)"
  using deutsch_transform_def by auto

abbreviation (in deutsch) V‚á©f:: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"V‚á©f ‚â° Matrix.mat 4 4 (Œª(i,j). 
                if i=0 ‚àß j=0 then 1 - f(0) else
                  (if i=0 ‚àß j=1 then f(0) else
                    (if i=1 ‚àß j=0 then f(0) else
                      (if i=1 ‚àß j=1 then 1 - f(0) else
                        (if i=2 ‚àß j=2 then 1 - f(1) else
                          (if i=2 ‚àß j=3 then f(1) else
                            (if i=3 ‚àß j=2 then f(1) else
                              (if i=3 ‚àß j=3 then 1 - f(1) else 0))))))))"

lemma (in deutsch) deutsch_transform_alt_rep_coeff_is_zero [simp]:
  shows "V‚á©f $$ (0,2) = 0" and "V‚á©f $$ (0,3) = 0"
    and "V‚á©f $$ (1,2) = 0" and "V‚á©f $$(1,3) = 0"
    and "V‚á©f $$ (2,0) = 0" and "V‚á©f $$(2,1) = 0"
    and "V‚á©f $$ (3,0) = 0" and "V‚á©f $$ (3,1) = 0"
  by auto

lemma (in deutsch) deutsch_transform_alt_rep_coeff [simp]:
  shows "V‚á©f $$ (0,1) = f(0)" and "V‚á©f $$ (1,0) = f(0)"
    and "V‚á©f $$(2,3) = f(1)" and "V‚á©f $$ (3,2) = f(1)"
    and "V‚á©f $$ (0,0) = 1 - f(0)" and "V‚á©f $$(1,1) = 1 - f(0)"
    and "V‚á©f $$ (2,2) = 1 - f(1)" and "V‚á©f $$ (3,3) = 1 - f(1)"
  by auto

lemma (in deutsch) deutsch_transform_alt_rep:
  shows "U‚á©f = V‚á©f"
proof
  show c0:"dim_row U‚á©f = dim_row V‚á©f" by simp
  show c1:"dim_col U‚á©f = dim_col V‚á©f" by simp
  fix i j:: nat
  assume "i < dim_row V‚á©f" and "j < dim_col V‚á©f"
  then have "i < 4" and "j < 4" by auto
  thus "U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = V‚á©f $$ (i,j)"
    by (smt deutsch_transform_alt_rep_coeff deutsch_transform_alt_rep_coeff_is_zero deutsch_transform_coeff
 deutsch_transform_coeff_is_zero set_4_disj)
qed

text ‚Äπ@{text U‚á©f} is a gate.‚Ä∫

lemma (in deutsch) transpose_of_deutsch_transform:
  shows "(U‚á©f)‚áßt = U‚á©f"
proof
  show "dim_row (U‚á©f‚áßt) = dim_row U‚á©f" by simp
  show "dim_col (U‚á©f‚áßt) = dim_col U‚á©f" by simp
  fix i j:: nat
  assume "i < dim_row U‚á©f" and "j < dim_col U‚á©f"
  thus "U‚á©f‚áßt $$ (i, j) = U‚á©f $$ (i, j)"
    by (auto simp add: transpose_mat_def)
      (metis deutsch_transform_coeff(1-4) deutsch_transform_coeff_is_zero set_4_disj)
qed

lemma (in deutsch) adjoint_of_deutsch_transform: 
  shows "(U‚á©f)‚áß‚Ä† = U‚á©f"
proof
  show "dim_row (U‚á©f‚áß‚Ä†) = dim_row U‚á©f" by simp
  show "dim_col (U‚á©f‚áß‚Ä†) = dim_col U‚á©f" by simp
  fix i j:: nat
  assume "i < dim_row U‚á©f" and "j < dim_col U‚á©f"
  thus "U‚á©f‚áß‚Ä† $$ (i, j) = U‚á©f $$ (i, j)"
    by (auto simp add: dagger_def)
      (metis complex_cnj_of_nat complex_cnj_zero deutsch_transform_coeff 
        deutsch_transform_coeff_is_zero set_4_disj)
qed

lemma (in deutsch) deutsch_transform_is_gate:
  shows "gate 2 U‚á©f"
proof
  show "dim_row U‚á©f = 2‚áß2" by simp
  show "square_mat U‚á©f" by simp
  show "unitary U‚á©f"
  proof-
    have "U‚á©f * U‚á©f = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f)"
    proof
      show "dim_row (U‚á©f * U‚á©f) = dim_row (1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f))" by simp
    next
      show "dim_col (U‚á©f * U‚á©f) = dim_col (1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f))" by simp
    next
      fix i j:: nat
      assume "i < dim_row (1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f))" and "j < dim_col (1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f))"
      then show "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f) $$ (i, j)"
        apply (auto simp add: deutsch_transform_alt_rep one_mat_def times_mat_def)
         apply (auto simp: scalar_prod_def) 
        using f_values by auto
    qed
    thus ?thesis by (simp add: adjoint_of_deutsch_transform unitary_def)
  qed
qed

text ‚Äπ
Two qubits are prepared. 
The first one in the state $|0\rangle$, the second one in the state $|1\rangle$.
‚Ä∫

abbreviation zero where "zero ‚â° unit_vec 2 0"
abbreviation one where "one ‚â° unit_vec 2 1" 

lemma ket_zero_is_state: 
  shows "state 1 |zero‚ü©"
  by (simp add: state_def ket_vec_def cpx_vec_length_def numerals(2))

lemma ket_one_is_state:
  shows "state 1 |one‚ü©" 
  by (simp add: state_def ket_vec_def cpx_vec_length_def numerals(2))

lemma ket_zero_to_mat_of_cols_list [simp]: "|zero‚ü© = mat_of_cols_list 2 [[1, 0]]"
  by (auto simp add: ket_vec_def mat_of_cols_list_def)

lemma ket_one_to_mat_of_cols_list [simp]: "|one‚ü© = mat_of_cols_list 2 [[0, 1]]"
  apply (auto simp add: ket_vec_def unit_vec_def mat_of_cols_list_def)
  using less_2_cases by fastforce

text ‚Äπ
Applying the Hadamard gate to the state $|0\rangle$ results in the new state 
@{term "œà‚á©0‚á©0"} = $\dfrac {(|0\rangle + |1\rangle)} {\sqrt 2 }$
‚Ä∫

abbreviation œà‚á©0‚á©0:: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©0‚á©0 ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 2 [[1/sqrt(2), 1/sqrt(2)]]"

lemma H_on_ket_zero: 
  shows "(H * |zero‚ü©) = œà‚á©0‚á©0"
proof 
  fix i j:: nat
  assume "i < dim_row œà‚á©0‚á©0" and "j < dim_col œà‚á©0‚á©0"
  then have "i ‚àà {0,1} ‚àß j = 0" by (simp add: mat_of_cols_list_def less_2_cases)
  then show "(H * |zero‚ü©) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©0‚á©0 $$ (i,j)"
    by (auto simp add: mat_of_cols_list_def times_mat_def scalar_prod_def H_def)
next
  show "dim_row (H * |zero‚ü©) = dim_row œà‚á©0‚á©0"  by (simp add: H_def mat_of_cols_list_def)
  show "dim_col (H * |zero‚ü©) = dim_col œà‚á©0‚á©0" by (simp add: H_def mat_of_cols_list_def)
qed

lemma H_on_ket_zero_is_state: 
  shows "state 1 (H * |zero‚ü©)"
proof
  show "gate 1 H" 
    using H_is_gate by simp
  show "state 1 |zero‚ü©" 
    using ket_zero_is_state by simp
qed

text ‚Äπ
Applying the Hadamard gate to the state $|0\rangle$ results in the new state 
@{text œà‚á©0‚á©1} = $\dfrac {(|0\rangle - |1\rangle)} {\sqrt 2}$.
‚Ä∫

abbreviation œà‚á©0‚á©1:: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©0‚á©1 ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 2 [[1/sqrt(2), -1/sqrt(2)]]"

lemma H_on_ket_one: 
  shows "(H * |one‚ü©) = œà‚á©0‚á©1"
proof 
  fix i j:: nat
  assume "i < dim_row œà‚á©0‚á©1" and "j < dim_col œà‚á©0‚á©1"
  then have "i ‚àà {0,1} ‚àß j = 0" by (simp add: mat_of_cols_list_def less_2_cases)
  then show "(H * |one‚ü©) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©0‚á©1 $$ (i,j)"
    by (auto simp add: mat_of_cols_list_def times_mat_def scalar_prod_def H_def ket_vec_def)
next
  show "dim_row (H * |one‚ü©) = dim_row œà‚á©0‚á©1" by (simp add: H_def mat_of_cols_list_def)
  show "dim_col (H * |one‚ü©) = dim_col œà‚á©0‚á©1" by (simp add: H_def mat_of_cols_list_def ket_vec_def)
qed

lemma H_on_ket_one_is_state: 
  shows "state 1 (H * |one‚ü©)"
  using H_is_gate ket_one_is_state by simp

text‚Äπ
Then, the state @{text œà‚á©1} = $\dfrac {(|00\rangle - |01\rangle + |10\rangle - |11\rangle)} {2} $
is obtained by taking the tensor product of the states 
@{text œà‚á©0‚á©0} = $\dfrac {(|0\rangle + |1\rangle)} {\sqrt 2} $  and  
@{text œà‚á©0‚á©1} = $\dfrac {(|0\rangle - |1\rangle)} {\sqrt 2} $.
‚Ä∫

abbreviation œà‚á©1:: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©1 ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 4 [[1/2, -1/2, 1/2, -1/2]]"

lemma œà‚á©0_to_œà‚á©1: 
  shows "(œà‚á©0‚á©0 ‚®Ç œà‚á©0‚á©1) = œà‚á©1"
proof 
  fix i j:: nat
  assume "i < dim_row œà‚á©1" and "j < dim_col œà‚á©1"
  then have "i ‚àà {0,1,2,3}" and "j = 0" using mat_of_cols_list_def by auto  
  moreover have "complex_of_real (sqrt 2) * complex_of_real (sqrt 2) = 2"
    by (metis mult_2_right numeral_Bit0 of_real_mult of_real_numeral real_sqrt_four real_sqrt_mult)
  ultimately show "(œà‚á©0‚á©0 ‚®Ç œà‚á©0‚á©1) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©1 $$ (i,j)" using mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
next 
  show "dim_row (œà‚á©0‚á©0 ‚®Ç œà‚á©0‚á©1) = dim_row œà‚á©1" by (simp add: mat_of_cols_list_def)
  show "dim_col (œà‚á©0‚á©0 ‚®Ç œà‚á©0‚á©1) = dim_col œà‚á©1" by (simp add: mat_of_cols_list_def)
qed

lemma œà‚á©1_is_state: 
  shows "state 2 œà‚á©1"
proof 
  show  "dim_col œà‚á©1 = 1" 
    by (simp add: Tensor.mat_of_cols_list_def)
  show "dim_row œà‚á©1 = 2‚áß2" 
    by (simp add: Tensor.mat_of_cols_list_def)
  show "‚à•Matrix.col œà‚á©1 0‚à• = 1"
    using H_on_ket_one_is_state H_on_ket_zero_is_state state.is_normal tensor_state2 œà‚á©0_to_œà‚á©1
    H_on_ket_one H_on_ket_zero by force
qed

text ‚Äπ
Next, the gate @{text U‚á©f} is applied to the state 
@{text œà‚á©1} = $\dfrac {(|00\rangle - |01\rangle + |10\rangle - |11\rangle)} {2}$ and 
@{text œà‚á©2}= $\dfrac {(|0f(0)\oplus 0\rangle - |0 f(0) \oplus 1\rangle + |1 f(1)\oplus 0\rangle - |1f(1)\oplus 1\rangle)} {2}$ 
is obtained. This simplifies to 
@{text œà‚á©2}= $\dfrac {(|0f(0)\rangle - |0 \overline{f(0)} \rangle + |1 f(1)\rangle - |1\overline{f(1)}\rangle)} {2}$ 
‚Ä∫

abbreviation (in deutsch) œà‚á©2:: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©2 ‚â°  mat_of_cols_list 4 [[(1 - f(0))/2 - f(0)/2,
                            f(0)/2 - (1 - f(0))/2,
                            (1 - f(1))/2 - f(1)/2,
                            f(1)/2 - (1- f(1))/2]]"

lemma (in deutsch) œà‚á©1_to_œà‚á©2: 
  shows "U‚á©f * œà‚á©1 = œà‚á©2"
proof 
  fix i j:: nat
  assume "i < dim_row œà‚á©2 " and "j < dim_col œà‚á©2"
  then have asm:"i ‚àà {0,1,2,3} ‚àß j = 0 " by (auto simp add: mat_of_cols_list_def)
  then have "i < dim_row U‚á©f ‚àß j < dim_col œà‚á©1" 
    using deutsch_transform_def mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
  then have "(U‚á©f * œà‚á©1) $$ (i, j) 
        = (‚àë k ‚àà {0 ..< dim_vec œà‚á©1}. (Matrix.row U‚á©f i) $ k * (Matrix.col œà‚á©1 j) $ k)"
    apply (auto simp add: times_mat_def scalar_prod_def).
  thus "(U‚á©f * œà‚á©1) $$ (i, j) = œà‚á©2 $$ (i, j)"
    using  mat_of_cols_list_def deutsch_transform_def asm by auto
next
  show "dim_row (U‚á©f * œà‚á©1) = dim_row œà‚á©2" by (simp add: mat_of_cols_list_def)
  show "dim_col (U‚á©f * œà‚á©1) = dim_col œà‚á©2" by (simp add: mat_of_cols_list_def)
qed

lemma (in deutsch) œà‚á©2_is_state:
  shows "state 2 œà‚á©2" 
proof
  show  "dim_col œà‚á©2 = 1" 
    by (simp add: Tensor.mat_of_cols_list_def)
  show "dim_row œà‚á©2 = 2‚áß2" 
    by (simp add: Tensor.mat_of_cols_list_def)
  show "‚à•Matrix.col œà‚á©2 0‚à• = 1"
    using gate_on_state_is_state œà‚á©1_is_state deutsch_transform_is_gate œà‚á©1_to_œà‚á©2 state_def
    by (metis (no_types, lifting))
qed

lemma H_tensor_Id_1: 
  defines d:"v ‚â°  mat_of_cols_list 4 [[1/sqrt(2), 0, 1/sqrt(2), 0],
                                  [0, 1/sqrt(2), 0, 1/sqrt(2)],
                                  [1/sqrt(2), 0, -1/sqrt(2), 0],
                                  [0, 1/sqrt(2), 0, -1/sqrt(2)]]"
  shows "(H ‚®Ç Id 1) = v"
proof
  show "dim_col (H ‚®Ç Id 1) = dim_col v"  
    by (simp add: d H_def Id_def mat_of_cols_list_def)
  show "dim_row (H ‚®Ç Id 1) = dim_row v"
    by (simp add: d H_def Id_def mat_of_cols_list_def)
  fix i j:: nat assume "i < dim_row v" and "j < dim_col v"
  then have "i ‚àà {0..<4} ‚àß j ‚àà {0..<4}" 
    by (auto simp add: d mat_of_cols_list_def)
  thus "(H ‚®Ç Id 1) $$ (i, j) = v $$ (i, j)"
    by (auto simp add: d Id_def H_def mat_of_cols_list_def)
qed

lemma H_tensor_Id_1_is_gate: 
  shows "gate 2 (H ‚®Ç Id 1)"
proof 
  show "dim_row (H ‚®Ç Quantum.Id 1) = 2‚áß2" 
    using H_tensor_Id_1 by (simp add: mat_of_cols_list_def)
  show "square_mat (H ‚®Ç Quantum.Id 1)" 
    using H_is_gate id_is_gate tensor_gate_sqr_mat by blast
  show "unitary (H ‚®Ç Quantum.Id 1)" 
    using H_is_gate gate_def id_is_gate tensor_gate by blast
qed

text ‚Äπ
Applying the Hadamard gate to the first qubit of @{text œà‚á©2} results in @{text œà‚á©3} = 
$\pm |f(0)\oplus f(1)\rangle \left[ \dfrac {(|0\rangle - |1\rangle)} {\sqrt 2}\right]$ 
‚Ä∫

abbreviation (in deutsch) œà‚á©3:: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©3 ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 4 
[[(1-f(0))/(2*sqrt(2)) - f(0)/(2*sqrt(2)) + (1-f(1))/(2*sqrt(2)) - f(1)/(2*sqrt(2)),
  f(0)/(2*sqrt(2)) - (1-f(0))/(2*sqrt(2)) + (f(1)/(2*sqrt(2)) - (1-f(1))/(2*sqrt(2))),
  (1-f(0))/(2*sqrt(2)) - f(0)/(2*sqrt(2)) - (1-f(1))/(2*sqrt(2)) + f(1)/(2*sqrt(2)),
  f(0)/(2*sqrt(2)) - (1-f(0))/(2*sqrt(2)) - f(1)/(2*sqrt(2)) + (1-f(1))/(2*sqrt(2))]]"

lemma (in deutsch) œà‚á©2_to_œà‚á©3: 
 shows "(H ‚®Ç Id 1) * œà‚á©2 = œà‚á©3" 
proof
  fix i j:: nat
  assume "i < dim_row œà‚á©3" and "j < dim_col œà‚á©3"
  then have a0:"i ‚àà {0,1,2,3} ‚àß j = 0" by (auto simp add: mat_of_cols_list_def)
  then have "i < dim_row (H ‚®Ç Id 1) ‚àß j < dim_col œà‚á©2"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def H_tensor_Id_1 by auto
  then have "((H ‚®Ç Id 1)*œà‚á©2) $$ (i,j)
        = (‚àë k ‚àà {0 ..< dim_vec œà‚á©2}. (Matrix.row (H ‚®Ç Id 1) i) $ k * (Matrix.col œà‚á©2 j) $ k)"
    by (auto simp: times_mat_def scalar_prod_def)
  thus "((H ‚®Ç Id 1) * œà‚á©2) $$ (i, j) = œà‚á©3 $$ (i, j)"
    using  mat_of_cols_list_def H_tensor_Id_1 a0 f_ge_0 
    by (auto simp: diff_divide_distrib)
next
  show "dim_row ((H ‚®Ç Id 1) * œà‚á©2) = dim_row œà‚á©3"
    using H_tensor_Id_1 mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
  show "dim_col ((H ‚®Ç Id 1) * œà‚á©2) = dim_col œà‚á©3"    
    using H_tensor_Id_1 mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
qed

lemma (in deutsch) œà‚á©3_is_state: 
  shows "state 2 œà‚á©3"
proof-
  have "gate 2 (H ‚®Ç Id 1)" 
    using H_tensor_Id_1_is_gate by simp
  thus "state 2 œà‚á©3" 
    using œà‚á©2_is_state œà‚á©2_to_œà‚á©3 by (metis gate_on_state_is_state)
qed

text ‚Äπ
Finally, all steps are put together. The result depends on the function f. If f is constant
the first qubit of $\pm |f(0)\oplus f(1)\rangle \left[ \dfrac {(|0\rangle - |1\rangle)} {\sqrt 2}\right]$
is 0, if it is is\_balanced it is 1. 
The algorithm only uses one evaluation of f(x) and will always succeed. 
‚Ä∫

definition (in deutsch) deutsch_algo:: "complex Matrix.mat" where 
"deutsch_algo ‚â° (H ‚®Ç Id 1) * (U‚á©f * ((H * |zero‚ü©) ‚®Ç (H * |one‚ü©)))"

lemma (in deutsch) deutsch_algo_result [simp]: 
  shows "deutsch_algo = œà‚á©3" 
  using deutsch_algo_def H_on_ket_zero H_on_ket_one œà‚á©0_to_œà‚á©1 œà‚á©1_to_œà‚á©2 œà‚á©2_to_œà‚á©3 by simp

lemma (in deutsch) deutsch_algo_result_is_state: 
  shows "state 2 deutsch_algo" 
  using œà‚á©3_is_state by simp


text ‚Äπ
If the function is constant then the measurement of the first qubit should result in the state 
$|0\rangle$ with probability 1. 
‚Ä∫

lemma (in deutsch) prob0_deutsch_algo_const:
  assumes "is_const" 
  shows "prob0 2 deutsch_algo 0 = 1" 
proof -
  have "{k| k::nat. (k < 4) ‚àß ¬¨ select_index 2 0 k} = {0,1}"
    using select_index_def by auto
  then have "prob0 2 deutsch_algo 0 = (‚àëj‚àà{0,1}. (cmod(deutsch_algo $$ (j,0)))‚áß2)"
    using deutsch_algo_result_is_state prob0_def by simp
  thus "prob0 2 deutsch_algo 0 = 1" 
    using assms is_const_def const_def by auto
qed

lemma (in deutsch) prob1_deutsch_algo_const: 
  assumes "is_const" 
  shows "prob1 2 deutsch_algo 0 = 0" 
  using assms prob0_deutsch_algo_const prob_sum_is_one[of "2" "deutsch_algo" "0"] 
deutsch_algo_result_is_state by simp

text ‚Äπ
If the function is balanced the measurement of the first qubit should result in the state $|1\rangle$ 
with probability 1. 
‚Ä∫

lemma (in deutsch) prob0_deutsch_algo_balanced:  
  assumes "is_balanced" 
  shows "prob0 2 deutsch_algo 0 = 0" 
proof-
  have "{k| k::nat. (k < 4) ‚àß ¬¨ select_index 2 0 k} = {0,1}"
    using select_index_def by auto
  then have "prob0 2 deutsch_algo 0 = (‚àëj ‚àà {0,1}. (cmod(deutsch_algo $$ (j,0)))‚áß2)"
    using deutsch_algo_result_is_state prob0_def by simp
  thus "prob0 2 deutsch_algo 0 = 0" 
    using is_swap_values assms is_balanced_def by auto
qed

lemma (in deutsch) prob1_deutsch_algo_balanced:
  assumes "is_balanced" 
  shows "prob1 2 deutsch_algo 0 = 1" 
using assms prob0_deutsch_algo_balanced prob_sum_is_one[of "2" "deutsch_algo" "0"] 
deutsch_algo_result_is_state by simp
 
text ‚ÄπEventually, the measurement of the first qubit results in $f(0)\oplus f(1)$. ‚Ä∫

definition (in deutsch) deutsch_algo_eval:: "real" where 
"deutsch_algo_eval ‚â° prob1 2 deutsch_algo 0"

lemma (in deutsch) sum_mod_2_cases:
  shows "(f 0 + f 1) mod 2 = 0 ‚ü∂ is_const" 
  and "(f 0 + f 1) mod 2 = 1 ‚ü∂ is_balanced"
  using f_cases is_balanced_sum_mod_2 is_const_sum_mod_2 by auto 

lemma (in deutsch) deutsch_algo_eval_is_sum_mod_2:
  shows "deutsch_algo_eval = (f 0 + f 1) mod 2"
  using deutsch_algo_eval_def f_cases is_const_sum_mod_2 is_balanced_sum_mod_2 
prob1_deutsch_algo_const prob1_deutsch_algo_balanced by auto

text ‚Äπ
If the algorithm returns 0 then one concludes that the input function is constant and
if it returns 1 then the function is balanced.
‚Ä∫

theorem (in deutsch) deutsch_algo_is_correct:
  shows "deutsch_algo_eval = 0 ‚ü∂ is_const" and "deutsch_algo_eval = 1 ‚ü∂ is_balanced"
  using deutsch_algo_eval_is_sum_mod_2 sum_mod_2_cases by auto

end

Theory Deutsch_Jozsa

(*
Authors: 
  Hanna Lachnitt, TU Wien, lachnitt@student.tuwien.ac.at
  Anthony Bordg, University of Cambridge, apdb3@cam.ac.uk
*) 

section ‚ÄπThe Deutsch-Jozsa Algorithm‚Ä∫

theory Deutsch_Jozsa
imports
  Deutsch
  More_Tensor
  Binary_Nat
begin


text ‚Äπ
Given a function $f:{0,1}^n \mapsto {0,1}$, the Deutsch-Jozsa algorithm decides if this function is 
constant or balanced with a single $f(x)$ circuit to evaluate the function for multiple values of $x$ 
simultaneously. The algorithm makes use of quantum parallelism and quantum interference.

A constant function with values in {0,1} returns either always 0 or always 1. 
A balanced function is 0 for half of the inputs and 1 for the other half. 
‚Ä∫

locale bob_fun =
  fixes f:: "nat ‚áí nat" and n:: "nat"
  assumes dom: "f ‚àà ({(i::nat). i < 2^n} ‚Üí‚á©E {0,1})"
  assumes dim: "n ‚â• 1"

context bob_fun
begin

definition const:: "nat ‚áí bool" where 
"const c = (‚àÄx‚àà{i::nat. i<2^n}. f x = c)"

definition is_const:: bool where 
"is_const ‚â° const 0 ‚à® const 1"

definition is_balanced:: bool where
"is_balanced ‚â° ‚àÉA B ::nat set. A ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < 2^n} ‚àß B ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < 2^n}
                   ‚àß card A = 2^(n-1) ‚àß card B = 2^(n-1)  
                   ‚àß (‚àÄx‚ààA. f x = 0)  ‚àß (‚àÄx‚ààB. f x = 1)"

lemma is_balanced_inter: 
  fixes A B:: "nat set"
  assumes "‚àÄx ‚àà A. f x = 0" and "‚àÄx ‚àà B. f x = 1" 
  shows "A ‚à© B = {}" 
  using assms by auto

lemma is_balanced_union:
  fixes A B:: "nat set"
  assumes "A ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < 2^n}" and "B ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < 2^n}" 
      and "card A = 2^(n-1)" and "card B = 2^(n-1)" 
      and "A ‚à© B = {}"
  shows "A ‚à™ B = {i::nat. i < 2^n}"
proof-
  have "finite A" and "finite B" 
    by (simp add: assms(3) card_ge_0_finite)
      (simp add: assms(4) card_ge_0_finite)
  then have "card(A ‚à™ B) = 2 * 2^(n-1)" 
    using assms(3-5) by (simp add: card_Un_disjoint)
  then have "card(A ‚à™ B) = 2^n"
    by (metis Nat.nat.simps(3) One_nat_def dim le_0_eq power_eq_if)
  moreover have "‚Ä¶ = card({i::nat. i < 2^n})" by simp
  moreover have "A ‚à™ B ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < 2^n}" 
    using assms(1,2) by simp
  moreover have "finite ({i::nat. i < 2^n})" by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    using card_subset_eq[of "{i::nat. i < 2^n}" "A ‚à™ B"] by simp
qed

lemma f_ge_0: "‚àÄx. f x ‚â• 0" by simp

lemma f_dom_not_zero: 
  shows "f ‚àà ({i::nat. n ‚â• 1 ‚àß i < 2^n} ‚Üí‚á©E {0,1})" 
  using dim dom by simp

lemma f_values: "‚àÄx ‚àà {(i::nat). i < 2^n} . f x = 0 ‚à® f x = 1" 
  using dom by auto

end (* bob_fun *)

text ‚ÄπThe input function has to be constant or balanced.‚Ä∫

locale jozsa = bob_fun +
  assumes const_or_balanced: "is_const ‚à® is_balanced "

text ‚Äπ
Introduce two customised rules: disjunctions with four disjuncts and induction starting from one 
instead of zero.
‚Ä∫

(* To deal with Uf it is often necessary to do a case distinction with four different cases.*)
lemma disj_four_cases:
  assumes "A ‚à® B ‚à® C ‚à® D" and "A ‚üπ P" and "B ‚üπ P" and "C ‚üπ P" and "D ‚üπ P"
  shows "P" 
  using assms by auto

text ‚ÄπThe unitary transform @{term U‚á©f}.‚Ä∫

definition (in jozsa) jozsa_transform:: "complex Matrix.mat" ("U‚á©f") where 
"U‚á©f ‚â° Matrix.mat (2^(n+1)) (2^(n+1)) (Œª(i,j). 
  if i = j then (1-f(i div 2)) else 
    if i = j + 1 ‚àß odd i then f(i div 2) else
      if i = j - 1 ‚àß even i ‚àß j‚â•1 then f(i div 2) else 0)"

lemma (in jozsa) jozsa_transform_dim [simp]:
  shows "dim_row U‚á©f = 2^(n+1)" and "dim_col U‚á©f = 2^(n+1)" 
  by (auto simp add: jozsa_transform_def)

lemma (in jozsa) jozsa_transform_coeff_is_zero [simp]:
  assumes "i < dim_row U‚á©f ‚àß j < dim_col U‚á©f"
  shows "(i‚â†j ‚àß ¬¨(i=j+1 ‚àß odd i) ‚àß ¬¨ (i=j-1 ‚àß even i ‚àß j‚â•1)) ‚ü∂ U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = 0"
  using jozsa_transform_def assms by auto

lemma (in jozsa) jozsa_transform_coeff [simp]: 
  assumes "i < dim_row U‚á©f ‚àß j < dim_col U‚á©f"
  shows "i = j ‚ü∂ U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = 1 - f (i div 2)"
  and "i = j + 1 ‚àß odd i ‚ü∂ U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = f (i div 2)"
  and "j ‚â• 1 ‚àß i = j - 1 ‚àß even i ‚ü∂ U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = f (i div 2)" 
  using jozsa_transform_def assms by auto

lemma (in jozsa) U‚á©f_mult_without_empty_summands_sum_even:
  fixes i j A
  assumes "i < dim_row U‚á©f" and "j < dim_col A" and "even i" and "dim_col U‚á©f = dim_row A"
  shows "(‚àëk‚àà{0..< dim_row A}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) =(‚àëk‚àà{i,i+1}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j))"
proof-
  have "(‚àëk ‚àà {0..< 2^(n+1)}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) = 
             (‚àëk ‚àà {0..<i}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) +
             (‚àëk ‚àà {i,i+1}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) +
             (‚àëk ‚àà {(i+2)..< 2^(n+1)}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j))" 
  proof- 
    have "{0..< 2^(n+1)} = {0..<i} ‚à™ {i..< 2^(n+1)} 
          ‚àß {i..< 2^(n+1)} = {i,i+1} ‚à™ {(i+2)..<2^(n+1)}" using assms(1-3) by auto
    moreover have "{0..<i} ‚à© {i,i+1} = {} 
                  ‚àß {i,i+1} ‚à© {(i+2)..< 2^(n+1)} = {} 
                  ‚àß {0..<i} ‚à© {(i+2)..< 2^(n+1)} = {}" using assms by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis
      using sum.union_disjoint
      by (metis (no_types, lifting) finite_Un finite_atLeastLessThan is_num_normalize(1) ivl_disj_int_two(3))
  qed
  moreover have "(‚àëk ‚àà {0..<i}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) = 0" 
  proof-
    have "k ‚àà {0..<i} ‚ü∂ (i‚â†k ‚àß ¬¨(i=k+1 ‚àß odd i) ‚àß ¬¨ (i=k-1 ‚àß even i ‚àß k‚â•1))" for k 
      using assms by auto
    then have "k ‚àà {0..<i} ‚ü∂ U‚á©f $$ (i,k) = 0" for k
      using assms(1) by auto
    then show ?thesis by simp
  qed
  moreover have "(‚àëk ‚àà {(i+2)..< 2^(n+1)}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) = 0" 
  proof- 
    have "k‚àà{(i+2)..< 2^(n+1)} ‚ü∂ (i‚â†k ‚àß ¬¨(i=k+1 ‚àß odd i) ‚àß ¬¨ (i=k-1 ‚àß even i ‚àß k‚â•1))" for k by auto
    then have "k ‚àà {(i+2)..< 2^(n+1)}‚ü∂ U‚á©f $$ (i,k) = 0" for k
      using assms(1) by auto
    then show ?thesis by simp
  qed
  moreover have  "dim_row A = 2^(n+1)" using assms(4) by simp
  ultimately show "?thesis" by(metis (no_types, lifting) add.left_neutral add.right_neutral)
qed

lemma (in jozsa) U‚á©f_mult_without_empty_summands_even: 
  fixes i j A
  assumes "i < dim_row U‚á©f" and "j < dim_col A" and "even i" and "dim_col U‚á©f = dim_row A"
  shows "(U‚á©f * A) $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk ‚àà {i,i+1}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j))"
proof-
  have "(U‚á©f * A) $$ (i,j) = (‚àë k‚àà{0..< dim_row A}. (U‚á©f $$ (i,k)) * (A $$ (k,j)))"
    using assms(1,2,4) index_matrix_prod by (simp add: atLeast0LessThan)
  then show ?thesis
    using assms U‚á©f_mult_without_empty_summands_sum_even by simp
qed

lemma (in jozsa) U‚á©f_mult_without_empty_summands_sum_odd:
  fixes i j A
  assumes "i < dim_row U‚á©f" and "j < dim_col A" and "odd i" and "dim_col U‚á©f = dim_row A"
  shows "(‚àëk‚àà{0..< dim_row A}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) =(‚àëk‚àà{i-1,i}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j))"
proof-
  have "(‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^(n+1)}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) = 
             (‚àëk ‚àà {0..<i-1}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) +
             (‚àëk ‚àà {i-1,i}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) +
             (‚àëk ‚àà {i+1..< 2^(n+1)}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j))" 
  proof- 
    have "{0..< 2^(n+1)} = {0..<i-1} ‚à™ {i-1..< 2^(n+1)} 
          ‚àß {i-1..< 2^(n+1)} = {i-1,i} ‚à™ {i+1..<2^(n+1)}" using assms(1-3) by auto
    moreover have "{0..<i-1} ‚à© {i-1,i} = {} 
                  ‚àß {i-1,i} ‚à© {i+1..< 2^(n+1)} = {} 
                  ‚àß {0..<i-1} ‚à© {i+1..< 2^(n+1)} = {}" using assms by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis
      using sum.union_disjoint 
      by(metis (no_types, lifting) finite_Un finite_atLeastLessThan is_num_normalize(1) ivl_disj_int_two(3))
  qed
  moreover have "(‚àëk ‚àà {0..<i-1}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) = 0"
  proof-
    have "k ‚àà {0..<i-1} ‚ü∂ (i‚â†k ‚àß ¬¨(i=k+1 ‚àß odd i) ‚àß ¬¨ (i=k-1 ‚àß even i ‚àß k‚â•1))" for k by auto
    then have "k ‚àà {0..<i-1} ‚ü∂ U‚á©f $$ (i,k) = 0" for k
      using assms(1) by auto
    then show ?thesis by simp
  qed
  moreover have "(‚àëk ‚àà {i+1..< 2^(n+1)}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) = 0" 
    using assms(3) by auto 
  moreover have  "dim_row A = 2^(n+1)" using assms(4) by simp
  ultimately show "?thesis" by(metis (no_types, lifting) add.left_neutral add.right_neutral)
qed

lemma (in jozsa) U‚á©f_mult_without_empty_summands_odd: 
  fixes i j A
  assumes "i < dim_row U‚á©f" and "j < dim_col A" and "odd i" and "dim_col U‚á©f = dim_row A"
  shows "(U‚á©f * A) $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk ‚àà {i-1,i}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * A $$ (k,j)) "
proof-
  have "(U‚á©f * A) $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk ‚àà {0 ..< dim_row A}. (U‚á©f $$ (i,k)) * (A $$ (k,j)))"
    using assms(1,2,4) index_matrix_prod by (simp add: atLeast0LessThan)
  then show "?thesis" 
    using assms U‚á©f_mult_without_empty_summands_sum_odd by auto
qed

text ‚Äπ@{term U‚á©f} is a gate.‚Ä∫

lemma (in jozsa) transpose_of_jozsa_transform:
  shows "(U‚á©f)‚áßt = U‚á©f"
proof
  show "dim_row (U‚á©f‚áßt) = dim_row U‚á©f" by simp
next
  show "dim_col (U‚á©f‚áßt) = dim_col U‚á©f" by simp
next
  fix i j:: nat
  assume a0: "i < dim_row U‚á©f" and a1: "j < dim_col U‚á©f"
  then show "U‚á©f‚áßt $$ (i, j) = U‚á©f $$ (i, j)" 
  proof (induct rule: disj_four_cases)
    show "i=j ‚à® (i=j+1 ‚àß odd i) ‚à® (i=j-1 ‚àß even i ‚àß j‚â•1) ‚à® (i‚â†j ‚àß ¬¨(i=j+1 ‚àß odd i) ‚àß ¬¨ (i=j-1 ‚àß even i ‚àß j‚â•1))" 
      by linarith
  next
    assume "i = j"
    then show "U‚á©f‚áßt $$ (i,j) = U‚á©f $$ (i,j)" using a0 by simp
  next
    assume "(i=j+1 ‚àß odd i)"
    then show "U‚á©f‚áßt $$ (i,j) = U‚á©f $$ (i,j)" using transpose_mat_def a0 a1 by auto
  next
    assume a2:"(i=j-1 ‚àß even i ‚àß j‚â•1)"
    then have "U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = f (i div 2)" 
      using a0 a1 jozsa_transform_coeff by auto
    moreover have "U‚á©f $$ (j,i) = f (i div 2)" 
      using a0 a1 a2 jozsa_transform_coeff
      by (metis add_diff_assoc2 diff_add_inverse2 even_plus_one_iff even_succ_div_two jozsa_transform_dim)
    ultimately show "?thesis"
      using transpose_mat_def a0 a1 by simp
  next 
    assume a2:"(i‚â†j ‚àß ¬¨(i=j+1 ‚àß odd i) ‚àß ¬¨ (i=j-1 ‚àß even i ‚àß j‚â•1))"
    then have "(j‚â†i ‚àß ¬¨(j=i+1 ‚àß odd j) ‚àß ¬¨ (j=i-1 ‚àß even j ‚àß i‚â•1))" 
      by (metis le_imp_diff_is_add diff_add_inverse even_plus_one_iff le_add1)
    then have "U‚á©f $$ (j,i) = 0" 
      using jozsa_transform_coeff_is_zero a0 a1 by auto
    moreover have "U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = 0" 
      using jozsa_transform_coeff_is_zero a0 a1 a2 by auto
    ultimately show "U‚á©f‚áßt $$ (i,j) = U‚á©f $$ (i,j)"
      using transpose_mat_def a0 a1 by simp
  qed 
qed

lemma (in jozsa) adjoint_of_jozsa_transform: 
  shows "(U‚á©f)‚áß‚Ä† = U‚á©f"
proof
  show "dim_row (U‚á©f‚áß‚Ä†) = dim_row U‚á©f" by simp
next
  show "dim_col (U‚á©f‚áß‚Ä†) = dim_col U‚á©f" by simp
next
  fix i j:: nat
  assume a0: "i < dim_row U‚á©f" and a1: "j < dim_col U‚á©f"
  then show "U‚á©f‚áß‚Ä† $$ (i,j) = U‚á©f $$ (i,j)"
  proof (induct rule: disj_four_cases)
  show "i=j ‚à® (i=j+1 ‚àß odd i) ‚à® (i=j-1 ‚àß even i ‚àß j‚â•1) ‚à® (i‚â†j ‚àß ¬¨(i=j+1 ‚àß odd i) ‚àß ¬¨ (i=j-1 ‚àß even i ‚àß j‚â•1))"
    by linarith
  next
    assume "i=j"
    then show "U‚á©f‚áß‚Ä† $$ (i,j) = U‚á©f $$ (i,j)" using a0 dagger_def by simp
  next
    assume "(i=j+1 ‚àß odd i)"
    then show "U‚á©f‚áß‚Ä† $$ (i,j) = U‚á©f $$ (i,j)" using a0 dagger_def by auto
  next
    assume a2:"(i=j-1 ‚àß even i ‚àß j‚â•1)"
    then have "U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = f (i div 2)" 
      using a0 a1 jozsa_transform_coeff by auto
    moreover have "U‚á©f‚áß‚Ä†  $$ (j,i) = f (i div 2)" 
      using a1 a2 jozsa_transform_coeff dagger_def by auto
    ultimately show "U‚á©f‚áß‚Ä† $$ (i,j) = U‚á©f $$ (i,j)"
      by(metis a0 a1 cnj_transpose_is_dagger dim_row_of_dagger index_transpose_mat dagger_of_transpose_is_cnj transpose_of_jozsa_transform)
  next 
    assume a2: "(i‚â†j ‚àß ¬¨(i=j+1 ‚àß odd i) ‚àß ¬¨ (i=j-1 ‚àß even i ‚àß j‚â•1))"
    then have f0:"(i‚â†j ‚àß ¬¨(j=i+1 ‚àß odd j) ‚àß ¬¨ (j=i-1 ‚àß even j ‚àß i‚â•1))" 
      by (metis le_imp_diff_is_add diff_add_inverse even_plus_one_iff le_add1)
    then have "U‚á©f $$ (j,i) = 0" and "cnj 0 = 0"
      using jozsa_transform_coeff_is_zero a0 a1 a2 by auto
    then have "U‚á©f‚áß‚Ä† $$ (i,j) = 0" 
      using a0 a1 dagger_def by simp
    then show "U‚á©f‚áß‚Ä† $$ (i, j) = U‚á©f $$ (i, j)" 
      using a0 a1 a2 jozsa_transform_coeff_is_zero by auto
  qed 
qed

lemma (in jozsa) jozsa_transform_is_unitary_index_even:
  fixes i j:: nat
  assumes "i < dim_row U‚á©f" and "j < dim_col U‚á©f" and "even i"
  shows "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f) $$ (i,j)"
proof-
  have "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk ‚àà {i,i+1}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * U‚á©f $$ (k,j)) " 
    using U‚á©f_mult_without_empty_summands_even[of i j U‚á©f ] assms by simp
  moreover have "U‚á©f $$ (i,i) * U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2)) * U‚á©f $$ (i,j)"
    using assms(1,3) by simp
  moreover have f0: "U‚á©f $$ (i,i+1) * U‚á©f $$ (i+1,j) = f(i div 2) * U‚á©f $$ (i+1,j)"
    by (metis One_nat_def Suc_leI add.right_neutral add_Suc_right assms(1) assms(3) diff_add_inverse2 
even_add even_mult_iff jozsa_transform_coeff(3) jozsa_transform_dim le_add2 le_eq_less_or_eq odd_one 
one_add_one power.simps(2))
  ultimately have f1: "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2)) * U‚á©f $$ (i,j) +  f(i div 2) * U‚á©f $$ (i+1,j)" by auto
  thus ?thesis
  proof (induct rule: disj_four_cases)
    show "j=i ‚à® (j=i+1 ‚àß odd j) ‚à® (j=i-1 ‚àß even j ‚àß i‚â•1) ‚à® (j‚â†i ‚àß ¬¨(j=i+1 ‚àß odd j) ‚àß ¬¨ (j=i-1 ‚àß even j ‚àß i‚â•1))"
      by linarith
  next
    assume a0:"j=i"
    then have "U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2))" 
      using assms(1,2) a0 by simp
    moreover have "U‚á©f $$ (i+1,j) = f(i div 2)"
      using assms(1,3) a0 by auto
    ultimately have "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2)) * (1-f(i div 2)) +  f(i div 2) * f(i div 2)" 
      using f1 by simp
    moreover have "(1-f(i div 2)) * (1-f(i div 2)) + f(i div 2) * f(i div 2) = 1" 
      using f_values assms(1)
      by (metis (no_types, lifting) Nat.minus_nat.diff_0 diff_add_0 diff_add_inverse jozsa_transform_dim(1) 
          less_power_add_imp_div_less mem_Collect_eq mult_eq_if one_power2 power2_eq_square power_one_right) 
    ultimately show "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f) $$ (i,j)"  by(metis assms(2) a0 index_one_mat(1) of_nat_1)
  next
    assume a0: "(j=i+1 ‚àß odd j)"
    then have "U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = f(i div 2)" 
      using assms(1,2) a0 by simp
    moreover have "U‚á©f $$ (i+1,j) = (1-f(i div 2))"
      using assms(2,3) a0 by simp
    ultimately have "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2)) * f(i div 2) + f(i div 2) * (1-f(i div 2))"
      using f0 f1 assms by simp
    then show "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f) $$ (i,j)" 
      using assms(1,2) a0 by auto
  next
    assume "(j=i-1 ‚àß even j ‚àß i‚â•1)"
    then show "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f) $$ (i,j)" 
      using assms(3) dvd_diffD1 odd_one by blast
  next 
    assume a0:"(j‚â†i ‚àß ¬¨(j=i+1 ‚àß odd j) ‚àß ¬¨ (j=i-1 ‚àß even j ‚àß i‚â•1))"
    then have "U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = 0" 
      using assms(1,2) by(metis index_transpose_mat(1) jozsa_transform_coeff_is_zero jozsa_transform_dim transpose_of_jozsa_transform)
    moreover have "U‚á©f $$ (i+1,j) = 0" 
      using assms a0 by auto
    ultimately have "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2)) * 0 +  f(i div 2) * 0" 
      by (simp add: f1)
    then show "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f) $$ (i,j)" 
      using a0 assms(1,2) by(metis add.left_neutral index_one_mat(1) jozsa_transform_dim mult_0_right of_nat_0)
  qed
qed

lemma (in jozsa) jozsa_transform_is_unitary_index_odd:
  fixes i j:: nat
  assumes "i < dim_row U‚á©f" and "j < dim_col U‚á©f" and "odd i"
  shows "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f) $$ (i,j)"
proof-
  have f0: "i ‚â• 1"  
    using linorder_not_less assms(3) by auto
  have "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk ‚àà {i-1,i}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * U‚á©f $$ (k,j)) " 
    using U‚á©f_mult_without_empty_summands_odd[of i j U‚á©f ] assms by simp
  moreover have "(‚àëk ‚àà {i-1,i}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * U‚á©f $$ (k,j)) 
                 = U‚á©f $$ (i,i-1) * U‚á©f $$ (i-1,j) +  U‚á©f $$ (i,i) * U‚á©f $$ (i,j)"
    using f0 by simp
  moreover have "U‚á©f $$ (i,i) * U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2)) * U‚á©f $$ (i,j)" 
    using assms(1,2) by simp
  moreover have f1: "U‚á©f $$ (i,i-1) * U‚á©f $$ (i-1,j) = f(i div 2) * U‚á©f $$ (i-1,j)" 
    using assms(1) assms(3) by simp
  ultimately have f2: "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = f(i div 2) * U‚á©f $$ (i-1,j) + (1-f(i div 2)) * U‚á©f $$ (i,j)" by simp
  then show "?thesis"
  proof (induct rule: disj_four_cases)
    show "j=i ‚à® (j=i+1 ‚àß odd j) ‚à® (j=i-1 ‚àß even j ‚àß i‚â•1) ‚à® (j‚â†i ‚àß ¬¨(j=i+1 ‚àß odd j) ‚àß ¬¨ (j=i-1 ‚àß even j ‚àß i‚â•1))"
      by linarith
  next
    assume a0:"j=i"
    then have "U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2))"
      using assms(1,2) by simp
    moreover have "U‚á©f $$ (i-1,j) = f(i div 2)"
      using a0 assms
      by (metis index_transpose_mat(1) jozsa_transform_coeff(2) less_imp_diff_less odd_two_times_div_two_nat 
          odd_two_times_div_two_succ transpose_of_jozsa_transform)
    ultimately have "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = f(i div 2) * f(i div 2) + (1-f(i div 2)) * (1-f(i div 2))"
      using f2 by simp
    moreover have "f(i div 2) * f(i div 2) + (1-f(i div 2)) * (1-f(i div 2)) = 1" 
      using f_values assms(1)
      by (metis (no_types, lifting) Nat.minus_nat.diff_0 diff_add_0 diff_add_inverse jozsa_transform_dim(1) 
          less_power_add_imp_div_less mem_Collect_eq mult_eq_if one_power2 power2_eq_square power_one_right) 
    ultimately show "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f) $$ (i,j)" by(metis assms(2) a0 index_one_mat(1) of_nat_1)
  next
    assume a0:"(j=i+1 ‚àß odd j)"
    then show "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f) $$ (i,j)" 
      using assms(3) dvd_diffD1 odd_one even_plus_one_iff by blast
  next
    assume a0:"(j=i-1 ‚àß even j ‚àß i‚â•1)"
    then have "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = f(i div 2) * (1-f(i div 2)) + (1-f(i div 2)) * f(i div 2)" 
      using f0 f1 f2 assms
      by (metis jozsa_transform_coeff(1) Groups.ab_semigroup_mult_class.mult.commute even_succ_div_two f2 
          jozsa_transform_dim odd_two_times_div_two_nat odd_two_times_div_two_succ of_nat_add of_nat_mult)
    then show "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f) $$ (i,j)" 
      using assms(1) a0 by auto
  next 
    assume a0:"j‚â†i ‚àß ¬¨(j=i+1 ‚àß odd j) ‚àß ¬¨ (j=i-1 ‚àß even j ‚àß i‚â•1)"
    then have "U‚á©f $$ (i,j) = 0" 
      by (metis assms(1,2) index_transpose_mat(1) jozsa_transform_coeff_is_zero jozsa_transform_dim transpose_of_jozsa_transform)
    moreover have "U‚á©f $$ (i-1,j) = 0" 
      using assms a0 f0 
      by auto (smt One_nat_def Suc_n_not_le_n add_diff_inverse_nat assms(1) assms(2) diff_Suc_less even_add 
jozsa_transform_coeff_is_zero jozsa_axioms less_imp_le less_le_trans less_one odd_one)
    ultimately have "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2)) * 0 +  f(i div 2) * 0" 
      using f2 by simp
    then show "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f) $$ (i,j)" 
      using a0 assms by (metis add.left_neutral index_one_mat(1) jozsa_transform_dim mult_0_right of_nat_0)
  qed
qed

lemma (in jozsa) jozsa_transform_is_gate:
  shows "gate (n+1) U‚á©f"
proof
  show "dim_row U‚á©f = 2^(n+1)" by simp
next
  show "square_mat U‚á©f" by simp
next
  show "unitary U‚á©f"
  proof-
    have "U‚á©f * U‚á©f = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f)"
    proof
      show "dim_row (U‚á©f * U‚á©f) = dim_row (1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f))" by simp
      show "dim_col (U‚á©f * U‚á©f) = dim_col (1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f))" by simp
      fix i j:: nat
      assume "i < dim_row (1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f))" and "j < dim_col (1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f))"
      then have "i < dim_row U‚á©f" and "j < dim_col U‚á©f" by auto
      then show "(U‚á©f * U‚á©f) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m (dim_col U‚á©f) $$ (i,j)" 
        using jozsa_transform_is_unitary_index_odd jozsa_transform_is_unitary_index_even by blast
    qed
    thus ?thesis by (simp add: adjoint_of_jozsa_transform unitary_def)
  qed
qed

text ‚ÄπN-fold application of the tensor product‚Ä∫

fun iter_tensor:: "complex Matrix.mat ‚áí nat ‚áí complex Matrix.mat" ("_ ‚äó‚áó_‚áñ" 75)  where
  "A ‚äó‚áó(Suc 0)‚áñ = A"  
| "A ‚äó‚áó(Suc k)‚áñ = A ‚®Ç (A ‚äó‚áók‚áñ)"

lemma one_tensor_is_id [simp]:
  fixes A
  shows "A ‚äó‚áó1‚áñ = A"
  using one_mat_def by simp

lemma iter_tensor_suc: 
  fixes n
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows " A ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ = A ‚®Ç (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)" 
  using assms by (metis Deutsch_Jozsa.iter_tensor.simps(2) One_nat_def Suc_le_D)

lemma dim_row_of_iter_tensor [simp]:
  fixes A n
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "dim_row(A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) = (dim_row A)^n"
  using assms
proof (rule nat_induct_at_least)
  show "dim_row (A ‚äó‚áó1‚áñ) = (dim_row A)^1"
    using one_tensor_is_id by simp
  fix n:: nat
  assume "n ‚â• 1" and "dim_row (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) = (dim_row A)^n"
  then show "dim_row (A ‚äó‚áóSuc n‚áñ) = (dim_row A)^Suc n"
    using iter_tensor_suc assms dim_row_tensor_mat by simp
qed

lemma dim_col_of_iter_tensor [simp]:
  fixes A n
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "dim_col(A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) = (dim_col A)^n"
  using assms
proof (rule nat_induct_at_least)
  show "dim_col (A ‚äó‚áó1‚áñ) = (dim_col A)^1"
    using one_tensor_is_id by simp
  fix n:: nat
  assume "n ‚â• 1" and "dim_col (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) = (dim_col A)^n"
  then show "dim_col (A ‚äó‚áóSuc n‚áñ) = (dim_col A)^Suc n"
    using iter_tensor_suc assms dim_col_tensor_mat by simp
qed

lemma iter_tensor_values:
  fixes A n i j
  assumes "n ‚â• 1" and "i < dim_row (A ‚®Ç (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ))" and "j < dim_col (A ‚®Ç (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ))"
  shows "(A ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ) $$ (i,j) = (A ‚®Ç (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)) $$ (i,j)"
  using assms by (metis One_nat_def le_0_eq not0_implies_Suc iter_tensor.simps(2))

lemma iter_tensor_mult_distr:
  assumes "n ‚â• 1" and "dim_col A = dim_row B" and "dim_col A > 0" and "dim_col B > 0"
  shows "(A ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ) * (B ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ) = (A * B) ‚®Ç ((A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) * (B ‚äó‚áón‚áñ))" 
proof-
  have "(A ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ) * (B ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ) = (A ‚®Ç (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)) * (B ‚®Ç (B ‚äó‚áón‚áñ))" 
    using Suc_le_D assms(1) by fastforce
  then show "?thesis" 
    using mult_distr_tensor[of "A" "B" "(iter_tensor A n)" "(iter_tensor B n)"] assms by simp
qed

lemma index_tensor_mat_with_vec2_row_cond:
  fixes A B:: "complex Matrix.mat" and i:: "nat" 
  assumes "i < 2 * (dim_row B)" and "i ‚â• dim_row B" and "dim_col B > 0"
and "dim_row A = 2" and "dim_col A = 1"
  shows "(A ‚®Ç B) $$ (i,0) = (A $$ (1,0)) * (B $$ (i-dim_row B,0))"
proof-
  have "(A ‚®Ç B) $$ (i,0) = A $$ (i div (dim_row B),0) * B $$ (i mod (dim_row B),0)"
    using assms index_tensor_mat[of A "dim_row A" "dim_col A" B "dim_row B" "dim_col B" i 0] by simp
  moreover have "i div (dim_row B) = 1" 
    using assms(1,2,4) by simp
  then have "i mod (dim_row B) = i - (dim_row B)" 
    by (simp add: modulo_nat_def)
  ultimately show "(A ‚®Ç B) $$ (i,0) = (A $$ (1,0)) * (B $$ (i-dim_row B,0))" 
    by (simp add: ‚Äπi div dim_row B = 1‚Ä∫)
qed

lemma iter_tensor_of_gate_is_gate:
  fixes A:: "complex Matrix.mat" and n m:: "nat" 
  assumes "gate m A" and "n ‚â• 1" 
  shows "gate (m*n) (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)"
  using assms(2)
proof(rule nat_induct_at_least)
  show "gate (m * 1) (A ‚äó‚áó1‚áñ)" using assms(1) by simp
  fix n:: nat
  assume "n ‚â• 1" and IH:"gate (m * n) (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)"
  then have "A ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ = A ‚®Ç (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)" 
    by (simp add: iter_tensor_suc)
  moreover have "gate (m*n + m) (A ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ)"  
    using tensor_gate assms(1) by (simp add: IH add.commute calculation(1))
  then show "gate (m*(Suc n)) (A ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ)"
    by (simp add: add.commute)
qed

lemma iter_tensor_of_state_is_state:
  fixes A:: "complex Matrix.mat" and n m:: "nat" 
  assumes "state m A" and "n‚â•1" 
  shows "state (m*n) (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)"
  using assms(2)
proof(rule nat_induct_at_least)
  show "state (m * 1) (A ‚äó‚áó1‚áñ)"
    using one_tensor_is_id assms(1) by simp
  fix n:: nat
  assume "n ‚â• 1" and IH:"state (m * n) (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)"
  then have "A ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ = A ‚®Ç (A ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)" 
    by (simp add: iter_tensor_suc)
  moreover have "state (m*n + m) (A ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ)"  
    using tensor_gate assms(1) by (simp add: IH add.commute calculation)
  then show "state (m*(Suc n)) (A ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ)" 
    by (simp add: add.commute)
qed

text ‚Äπ
We prepare n+1 qubits. The first n qubits in the state $|0\rangle$, the last one in the state 
$|1\rangle$.
‚Ä∫

abbreviation œà‚á©1‚á©0:: "nat ‚áí complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©1‚á©0 n ‚â° Matrix.mat (2^n) 1 (Œª(i,j). 1/(sqrt 2)^n)" 

lemma œà‚á©1‚á©0_values:
  fixes i j n
  assumes "i < dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)" and "j < dim_col (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)" 
  shows "(œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) $$ (i,j) = 1/(sqrt 2)^n" 
  using assms case_prod_conv by simp

text ‚Äπ$H^{\otimes n}$ is applied to $|0\rangle^{\otimes n}$.‚Ä∫

lemma H_on_ket_zero: 
  shows "(H * |zero‚ü©) = œà‚á©1‚á©0 1"
proof 
  fix i j:: nat
  assume "i < dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 1)" and "j < dim_col (œà‚á©1‚á©0 1)"
  then have f1: "i ‚àà {0,1} ‚àß j = 0" by (simp add: less_2_cases)
  then show "(H * |zero‚ü©) $$ (i,j) = (œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) $$ (i,j)"
    by (auto simp add: times_mat_def scalar_prod_def H_def ket_vec_def)
next
  show "dim_row (H * |zero‚ü©) = dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 1)"  by (simp add: H_def)
  show "dim_col (H * |zero‚ü©) = dim_col (œà‚á©1‚á©0 1)" using H_def  
    by (simp add: ket_vec_def)
qed

lemma œà‚á©1‚á©0_tensor: 
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "(œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) ‚®Ç (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) = (œà‚á©1‚á©0 (Suc n))"
proof
  have "dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) * dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) = 2^(Suc n)" by simp 
  then show "dim_row ((œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) ‚®Ç (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)) = dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 (Suc n))" by simp
  have "dim_col (œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) * dim_col (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) = 1" by simp
  then show "dim_col ((œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) ‚®Ç (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)) = dim_col (œà‚á©1‚á©0 (Suc n))" by simp
next
  fix i j:: nat
  assume a0: "i < dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 (Suc n))" and a1: "j < dim_col (œà‚á©1‚á©0 (Suc n))"
  then have f0: "j = 0" and f1: "i < 2^(Suc n)" by auto
  then have f2:"(œà‚á©1‚á©0 (Suc n)) $$ (i,j) = 1/(sqrt 2)^(Suc n)" 
    using œà‚á©1‚á©0_values[of "i" "(Suc n)" "j"] a0 a1 by simp
  show "((œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) ‚®Ç (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)) $$ (i,j) = (œà‚á©1‚á©0 (Suc n)) $$ (i,j)" 
  proof (rule disjE) (*case distinction*)
    show "i < dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) ‚à® i ‚â• dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)" by linarith
  next (* case i < dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) *)
    assume a2: "i < dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)"
    then have "((œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) ‚®Ç (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)) $$ (i,j) = (œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) $$ (0,0) * (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) $$ (i,0)"
      using index_tensor_mat f0 assms by simp
    also have "... = 1/sqrt(2) * 1/(sqrt(2)^n)"
      using œà‚á©1‚á©0_values a2 assms by simp
    finally show "((œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) ‚®Ç (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)) $$ (i,j) = (œà‚á©1‚á©0 (Suc n)) $$ (i,j)" 
      using f2 divide_divide_eq_left power_Suc by simp
  next (* case i ‚â• dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) *)
    assume "i ‚â• dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)"
    then have "((œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) ‚®Ç (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)) $$ (i,0) = ((œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) $$ (1, 0)) * ((œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) $$ ( i -dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n),0))"
      using index_tensor_mat_with_vec2_row_cond[of i "(œà‚á©1‚á©0 1)" "(œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)" ] a0 a1 f0
      by (metis dim_col_mat(1) dim_row_mat(1) index_tensor_mat_with_vec2_row_cond power_Suc power_one_right)  
    then have "((œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) ‚®Ç (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)) $$ (i,0) = 1/sqrt(2) * 1/(sqrt 2)^n"
      using œà‚á©1‚á©0_values[of "i -dim_row (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)" "n" "j"] a0 a1 by simp
    then show  "((œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) ‚®Ç (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)) $$ (i,j) = (œà‚á©1‚á©0 (Suc n)) $$ (i,j)" 
      using f0 f1 divide_divide_eq_left power_Suc by simp
  qed
qed

lemma œà‚á©1‚á©0_tensor_is_state:
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "state n ( |zero‚ü© ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)"  
  using iter_tensor_of_state_is_state ket_zero_is_state assms by fastforce

lemma iter_tensor_of_H_is_gate:
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "gate n (H ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)" 
  using iter_tensor_of_gate_is_gate H_is_gate assms by fastforce

lemma iter_tensor_of_H_on_zero_tensor: 
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "(H ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) * ( |zero‚ü© ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) = œà‚á©1‚á©0 n"
  using assms
proof(rule nat_induct_at_least)
  show "(H ‚äó‚áó1‚áñ) * ( |zero‚ü© ‚äó‚áó1‚áñ) = œà‚á©1‚á©0 1"
    using H_on_ket_zero by simp
next
  fix n:: nat
  assume a0: "n ‚â• 1" and IH: "(H ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) * ( |zero‚ü© ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) = œà‚á©1‚á©0 n"
  then have "(H ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ) * ( |zero‚ü© ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ) = (H * |zero‚ü©) ‚®Ç ((H ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) * ( |zero‚ü© ‚äó‚áón‚áñ))" 
    using iter_tensor_mult_distr[of "n" "H" "|zero‚ü©"] a0 ket_vec_def H_def by(simp add: H_def) 
  also have  "... = (H * |zero‚ü©) ‚®Ç (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)" using IH by simp 
  also have "... = (œà‚á©1‚á©0 1) ‚®Ç (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)" using H_on_ket_zero by simp
  also have "... = (œà‚á©1‚á©0 (Suc n))" using œà‚á©1‚á©0_tensor a0 by simp
  finally show "(H ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ) * ( |zero‚ü© ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ) = (œà‚á©1‚á©0 (Suc n))" by simp
qed

lemma œà‚á©1‚á©0_is_state:
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "state n (œà‚á©1‚á©0 n)"
  using iter_tensor_of_H_is_gate œà‚á©1‚á©0_tensor_is_state assms gate_on_state_is_state iter_tensor_of_H_on_zero_tensor assms by metis

abbreviation œà‚á©1‚á©1:: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©1‚á©1 ‚â° Matrix.mat 2 1 (Œª(i,j). if i=0 then 1/sqrt(2) else -1/sqrt(2))"

lemma H_on_ket_one_is_œà‚á©1‚á©1: 
  shows "(H * |one‚ü©) = œà‚á©1‚á©1"
proof 
  fix i j:: nat
  assume "i < dim_row œà‚á©1‚á©1" and "j < dim_col œà‚á©1‚á©1"
  then have "i ‚àà {0,1} ‚àß j = 0" by (simp add: less_2_cases)
  then show "(H * |one‚ü©) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©1‚á©1 $$ (i,j)"
    by (auto simp add: times_mat_def scalar_prod_def H_def ket_vec_def)
next
  show "dim_row (H * |one‚ü©) = dim_row œà‚á©1‚á©1" by (simp add: H_def)
next 
  show "dim_col (H * |one‚ü©) = dim_col œà‚á©1‚á©1" by (simp add: H_def ket_vec_def)
qed

abbreviation œà‚á©1:: "nat ‚áí complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©1 n ‚â° Matrix.mat (2^(n+1)) 1 (Œª(i,j). if even i then 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1) else -1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1))"

lemma œà‚á©1_values_even[simp]:
  fixes i j n
  assumes "i < dim_row (œà‚á©1 n)" and "j < dim_col (œà‚á©1 n)" and "even i"
  shows "(œà‚á©1 n) $$ (i,j) = 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
  using assms case_prod_conv by simp

lemma œà‚á©1_values_odd [simp]:
  fixes i j n
  assumes "i < dim_row (œà‚á©1 n)" and "j < dim_col (œà‚á©1 n)" and "odd i"
  shows "(œà‚á©1 n) $$ (i,j) = -1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
  using assms case_prod_conv by simp

lemma "œà‚á©1‚á©0_tensor_œà‚á©1‚á©1_is_œà‚á©1":
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "(œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) ‚®Ç œà‚á©1‚á©1 = œà‚á©1 n" 
proof 
 show "dim_col ((œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) ‚®Ç œà‚á©1‚á©1) = dim_col (œà‚á©1 n)" by simp
next
  show "dim_row ((œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) ‚®Ç œà‚á©1‚á©1) = dim_row (œà‚á©1 n)" by simp
next
  fix i j:: nat
  assume a0: "i < dim_row (œà‚á©1 n)" and a1: "j < dim_col (œà‚á©1 n)"
  then have "i < 2^(n+1)" and "j = 0" by auto 
  then have f0: "((œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) ‚®Ç œà‚á©1‚á©1) $$ (i,j) = 1/(sqrt 2)^n * œà‚á©1‚á©1 $$ (i mod 2, j)" 
    using œà‚á©1‚á©0_values[of "i div 2" n "j div 1"] a0 a1 by simp
  show "((œà‚á©1‚á©0 n) ‚®Ç œà‚á©1‚á©1) $$ (i,j) = (œà‚á©1 n) $$ (i,j)" 
    using f0 œà‚á©1_values_even œà‚á©1_values_odd a0 a1 by auto 
qed

lemma œà‚á©1_is_state:
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "state (n+1) (œà‚á©1 n)" 
  using assms œà‚á©1‚á©0_tensor_œà‚á©1‚á©1_is_œà‚á©1 œà‚á©1‚á©0_is_state H_on_ket_one_is_state H_on_ket_one_is_œà‚á©1‚á©1 tensor_state by metis

abbreviation (in jozsa) œà‚á©2:: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©2 ‚â° Matrix.mat (2^(n+1)) 1 (Œª(i,j). if even i then (-1)^f(i div 2)/(sqrt 2)^(n+1) 
                                        else (-1)^(f(i div 2)+1)/(sqrt 2)^(n+1))"

lemma (in jozsa) œà‚á©2_values_even [simp]:
  fixes i j 
  assumes "i < dim_row œà‚á©2 " and "j < dim_col œà‚á©2" and "even i"
  shows "œà‚á©2 $$ (i,j) = (-1)^f(i div 2)/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
  using assms case_prod_conv by simp

lemma (in jozsa) œà‚á©2_values_odd [simp]:
  fixes i j 
  assumes "i < dim_row œà‚á©2" and "j < dim_col œà‚á©2" and "odd i"
  shows "œà‚á©2 $$ (i,j) = (-1)^(f(i div 2)+1)/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
  using assms case_prod_conv by simp

lemma (in jozsa) œà‚á©2_values_odd_hidden [simp]:
  assumes "2*k+1 < dim_row œà‚á©2" and "j < dim_col œà‚á©2" 
  shows "œà‚á©2 $$ (2*k+1,j) = ((-1)^(f((2*k+1) div 2)+1))/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
  using assms by simp

lemma (in jozsa) snd_rep_of_œà‚á©2:
  assumes "i < dim_row œà‚á©2"
  shows "((1-f(i div 2)) + -f(i div 2)) * 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1) = (-1)^f(i div 2)/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)"
    and "(-(1-f(i div 2))+(f(i div 2)))* 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1) = (-1)^(f(i div 2)+1)/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)"
proof- 
  have "i div 2 ‚àà {i. i < 2 ^ n}" 
    using assms by auto
  then have "real (Suc 0 - f (i div 2)) - real (f (i div 2)) = (- 1) ^ f (i div 2)" 
    using assms f_values by auto
  thus "((1-f(i div 2)) + -f(i div 2)) * 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1) = (-1)^f(i div 2)/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" by auto
next
  have "i div 2 ‚àà {i. i < 2^n}" 
    using assms by simp
  then have "(real (f (i div 2)) - real (Suc 0 - f (i div 2))) / (sqrt 2 ^ (n+1)) =
           - ((- 1) ^ f (i div 2) / (sqrt 2 ^ (n+1)))" 
   using assms f_values by fastforce
  then show "(-(1-f(i div 2))+(f(i div 2)))* 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1) = (-1)^(f(i div 2)+1)/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" by simp
qed

lemma (in jozsa) jozsa_transform_times_œà‚á©1_is_œà‚á©2:
  shows "U‚á©f * (œà‚á©1 n) = œà‚á©2" 
proof 
  show "dim_row (U‚á©f * (œà‚á©1 n)) = dim_row œà‚á©2" by simp
next
  show "dim_col (U‚á©f * (œà‚á©1 n)) = dim_col œà‚á©2" by simp
next
  fix i j ::nat
  assume a0: "i < dim_row œà‚á©2" and a1: "j < dim_col œà‚á©2"
  then have f0:"i ‚àà {0..2^(n+1)} ‚àß j=0" by simp
  then have f1: "i < dim_row U‚á©f ‚àß j < dim_col U‚á©f " using a0 by simp
  have f2: "i < dim_row (œà‚á©1 n) ‚àß j < dim_col (œà‚á©1 n)" using a0 a1 by simp
  show "(U‚á©f * (œà‚á©1 n)) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©2 $$ (i,j)"
  proof (rule disjE)
    show "even i ‚à® odd i" by auto
  next
    assume a2: "even i"
    then have "(U‚á©f * (œà‚á©1 n)) $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk ‚àà {i,i+1}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * (œà‚á©1 n) $$ (k,j))"
      using f1 f2 U‚á©f_mult_without_empty_summands_even[of i j "(œà‚á©1 n)"] by simp 
    moreover have "U‚á©f $$ (i,i) * (œà‚á©1 n) $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2))* 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
      using f0 f1 a2 by simp
    moreover have "U‚á©f $$ (i,i+1) * (œà‚á©1 n) $$ (i+1,j) = (-f(i div 2))* 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
      using f0 f1 a2 by auto
    ultimately have "(U‚á©f * (œà‚á©1 n)) $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2))* 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1) + (-f(i div 2))* 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" by simp
    also have "... = ((1-f(i div 2))+-f(i div 2)) * 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
      using add_divide_distrib 
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) mult.right_neutral of_int_add of_int_of_nat_eq)
    also have "... = œà‚á©2 $$ (i,j)" 
      using a0 a1 a2 snd_rep_of_œà‚á©2 by simp
    finally show "(U‚á©f * (œà‚á©1 n)) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©2 $$ (i,j)" by simp
  next 
    assume a2: "odd i"
    then have f6: "i‚â•1"  
    using linorder_not_less by auto
    have "(U‚á©f * (œà‚á©1 n)) $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk ‚àà {i-1,i}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * (œà‚á©1 n) $$ (k,j))"
      using f1 f2 a2 U‚á©f_mult_without_empty_summands_odd[of i j "(œà‚á©1 n)"]  
      by (metis dim_row_mat(1) jozsa_transform_dim(2)) 
    moreover have "(‚àëk ‚àà {i-1,i}. U‚á©f $$ (i,k) * (œà‚á©1 n) $$ (k,j)) 
                 = U‚á©f $$ (i,i-1) * (œà‚á©1 n) $$ (i-1,j) +  U‚á©f $$ (i,i) * (œà‚á©1 n) $$ (i,j)" 
      using a2 f6 by simp
    moreover have  "U‚á©f $$ (i,i) * (œà‚á©1 n) $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2))* -1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
      using f1 f2 a2 by simp
    moreover have "U‚á©f $$ (i,i-1) * (œà‚á©1 n) $$ (i-1,j) = f(i div 2)* 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
      using a0 a1 a2 by simp
    ultimately have "(U‚á©f * (œà‚á©1 n)) $$ (i,j) = (1-f(i div 2))* -1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1) +(f(i div 2))* 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
      using of_real_add by simp
    also have "... = (-(1-f(i div 2)) + (f(i div 2))) * 1/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) mult.right_neutral add_divide_distrib mult_minus1_right 
          of_int_add of_int_of_nat_eq)
    also have "... = (-1)^(f(i div 2)+1)/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
       using a0 a1 a2 snd_rep_of_œà‚á©2 by simp
   finally show "(U‚á©f * (œà‚á©1 n)) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©2 $$ (i,j)" 
      using a0 a1 a2 by simp
  qed
qed

lemma (in jozsa) œà‚á©2_is_state:
  shows "state (n+1) œà‚á©2" 
  using jozsa_transform_times_œà‚á©1_is_œà‚á©2 jozsa_transform_is_gate œà‚á©1_is_state dim gate_on_state_is_state by fastforce

text ‚Äπ@{text "H^‚á©‚äó n"} is the result of taking the nth tensor product of H‚Ä∫

abbreviation iter_tensor_of_H_rep:: "nat ‚áí complex Matrix.mat" ("H^‚á©‚äó _") where
"iter_tensor_of_H_rep n ‚â° Matrix.mat (2^n) (2^n) (Œª(i,j).(-1)^(i ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô j)/(sqrt 2)^n)"

lemma tensor_of_H_values [simp]:
  fixes n i j:: nat
  assumes "i < dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó n)" and "j < dim_col (H^‚á©‚äó n)"
  shows "(H^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,j) = (-1)^(i ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô j)/(sqrt 2)^n"
  using assms by simp

lemma dim_row_of_iter_tensor_of_H [simp]:
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "1 < dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó n)" 
  using assms by(metis One_nat_def Suc_1 dim_row_mat(1) le_trans lessI linorder_not_less one_less_power)

lemma iter_tensor_of_H_fst_pos:
  fixes n i j:: nat
  assumes "i < 2^n ‚à® j < 2^n" and "i < 2^(n+1) ‚àß j < 2^(n+1)"
  shows "(H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n)) $$ (i,j) = 1/sqrt(2) * ((H^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i mod 2^n, j mod 2^n))"
proof-
  have "(H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n)) $$ (i,j) = (-1)^(bip i (Suc n) j)/(sqrt 2)^(Suc n)"
    using assms by simp
  moreover have "bip i (Suc n) j = bip (i mod 2^n) n (j mod 2^n)" 
    using bitwise_inner_prod_fst_el_0 assms(1) by simp 
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    using bitwise_inner_prod_def by simp
qed

lemma iter_tensor_of_H_fst_neg:
  fixes n i j:: nat
  assumes "i ‚â• 2^n ‚àß j ‚â• 2^n" and "i < 2^(n+1) ‚àß j < 2^(n+1)"
  shows "(H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n)) $$ (i,j) = -1/sqrt(2) * (H^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i mod 2^n, j mod 2^n)"
proof-
  have "(H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n)) $$ (i,j) = (-1)^(bip i (n+1) j)/(sqrt 2)^(n+1)" 
    using assms(2) by simp
  moreover have "bip i (n+1) j = 1 + bip (i mod 2^n) n (j mod 2^n)" 
    using bitwise_inner_prod_fst_el_is_1 assms by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed 

lemma H_tensor_iter_tensor_of_H:   
  fixes n:: nat
  shows  "(H ‚®Ç H^‚á©‚äó n) = H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n)" 
proof
  fix i j:: nat
  assume a0: "i < dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n))" and a1: "j < dim_col (H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n))"
  then have f0: "i ‚àà {0..<2^(n+1)} ‚àß j ‚àà {0..<2^(n+1)}" by simp
  then have f1: "(H ‚®Ç H^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,j) = H $$ (i div (dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó n)),j div (dim_col (H^‚á©‚äó n))) 
                                       * (H^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i mod (dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó n)),j mod (dim_col (H^‚á©‚äó n)))"
    by (simp add: H_without_scalar_prod)
  show "(H ‚®Ç H^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,j) = (H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n)) $$ (i,j)"
  proof (rule disjE) 
    show "(i < 2^n ‚à® j < 2^n) ‚à® ¬¨(i < 2^n ‚à® j < 2^n)" by auto
  next
    assume a2: "(i < 2^n ‚à® j < 2^n)"
    then have "(H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n)) $$ (i,j) = 1/sqrt(2) * ((H^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i mod 2^n, j mod 2^n))" 
      using a0 a1 f0 iter_tensor_of_H_fst_pos by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) atLeastLessThan_iff)
    moreover have "H $$ (i div (dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó n)),j div (dim_col (H^‚á©‚äó n))) = 1/sqrt 2"
      using a0 a1 f0 H_without_scalar_prod H_values a2
      by (metis (no_types, lifting) dim_col_mat(1) dim_row_mat(1) div_less le_eq_less_or_eq 
          le_numeral_extra(2) less_power_add_imp_div_less plus_1_eq_Suc power_one_right) 
    ultimately show "(H ‚®Ç H^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,j) = (H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n)) $$ (i,j)" 
      using f1 by simp
  next 
    assume a2: "¬¨(i < 2^n ‚à® j < 2^n)"
    then have "i ‚â• 2^n ‚àß j ‚â• 2^n" by simp
    then have f2:"(H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n)) $$ (i,j) = -1/sqrt(2) * ((H^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i mod 2^n, j mod 2^n))" 
      using a0 a1 f0 iter_tensor_of_H_fst_neg by simp
    have "i div (dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó n)) =1" and "j div (dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó n)) = 1"  
      using a2 a0 a1 by auto
    then have "H $$ (i div (dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó n)),j div (dim_col (H^‚á©‚äó n))) = -1/sqrt 2"
      using a0 a1 f0 H_values_right_bottom[of "i div (dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó n))" "j div (dim_col (H^‚á©‚äó n))"] a2 
      by fastforce
    then show "(H ‚®Ç H^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,j) = (H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n)) $$ (i,j)" 
      using f1 f2 by simp
  qed
next
  show "dim_row (H ‚®Ç H^‚á©‚äó n) = dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n))" 
    by (simp add: H_without_scalar_prod) 
next
  show "dim_col (H ‚®Ç H^‚á©‚äó n) = dim_col (H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n))" 
    by (simp add: H_without_scalar_prod) 
qed

text ‚Äπ
We prove that @{term "H^‚á©‚äó n"} is indeed the matrix representation of @{term "H ‚äó‚áón‚áñ"}, the iterated 
tensor product of the Hadamard gate H.
‚Ä∫

lemma one_tensor_of_H_is_H:
  shows "(H^‚á©‚äó 1) = H"
proof(rule eq_matI)
  show "dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó 1) = dim_row H"
    by (simp add: H_without_scalar_prod)
  show "dim_col (H^‚á©‚äó 1) = dim_col H"
    by (simp add: H_without_scalar_prod)
next
  fix i j:: nat
  assume a0:"i < dim_row H" and a1:"j < dim_col H"
  then show "(H^‚á©‚äó 1) $$ (i,j) = H $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "(H^‚á©‚äó 1) $$ (0, 0) = 1/sqrt(2)" 
       using bitwise_inner_prod_def bin_rep_def by simp 
    moreover have "(H^‚á©‚äó 1) $$ (0,1) = 1/sqrt(2)" 
       using bitwise_inner_prod_def bin_rep_def by simp 
    moreover have "(H^‚á©‚äó 1) $$ (1,0) = 1/sqrt(2)" 
       using bitwise_inner_prod_def bin_rep_def by simp 
    moreover have "(H^‚á©‚äó 1) $$ (1,1) = -1/sqrt(2)" 
       using bitwise_inner_prod_def bin_rep_def by simp 
     ultimately show "(H^‚á©‚äó 1) $$ (i,j) = H $$ (i,j)" 
       using a0 a1 H_values H_values_right_bottom
       by (metis (no_types, lifting) H_without_scalar_prod One_nat_def dim_col_mat(1) dim_row_mat(1) 
divide_minus_left less_2_cases)
  qed
qed

lemma iter_tensor_of_H_rep_is_correct:
  fixes n:: nat
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "(H ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) = H^‚á©‚äó n"
  using assms
proof(rule nat_induct_at_least)
  show "(H ‚äó‚áó1‚áñ) = H^‚á©‚äó 1" 
    using one_tensor_is_id one_tensor_of_H_is_H by simp
next
  fix n:: nat
  assume a0:"n ‚â• 1" and IH:"(H ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) = H^‚á©‚äó n"
  then have "(H ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ) = H ‚®Ç (H ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)" 
    using iter_tensor_suc Nat.Suc_eq_plus1 by metis
  also have "... = H ‚®Ç (H^‚á©‚äó n)" 
    using IH by simp
  also have "... = H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n)" 
    using a0 H_tensor_iter_tensor_of_H by simp
  finally show "(H ‚äó‚áó(Suc n)‚áñ) = H^‚á©‚äó (Suc n)" 
    by simp
qed

text ‚Äπ@{text "HId^‚á©‚äó 1"} is the result of taking the tensor product of the nth tensor of H and Id 1 ‚Ä∫

abbreviation tensor_of_H_tensor_Id:: "nat ‚áí complex Matrix.mat" ("HId^‚á©‚äó _") where
"tensor_of_H_tensor_Id n ‚â° Matrix.mat (2^(n+1)) (2^(n+1)) (Œª(i,j).
  if (i mod 2 = j mod 2) then (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô (j div 2))/(sqrt 2)^n else 0)"

lemma mod_2_is_both_even_or_odd:
  "((even i ‚àß even j) ‚à® (odd i ‚àß odd j)) ‚ü∑ (i mod 2 = j mod 2)" 
  by (metis even_iff_mod_2_eq_zero odd_iff_mod_2_eq_one)
  
lemma HId_values [simp]:
  assumes "n ‚â• 1" and "i < dim_row (HId^‚á©‚äó n)" and "j < dim_col (HId^‚á©‚äó n)"
  shows "even i ‚àß even j ‚ü∂ (HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,j) = (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô (j div 2))/(sqrt 2)^n"
and "odd i ‚àß odd j ‚ü∂ (HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,j) = (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô (j div 2))/(sqrt 2)^n"
and "(i mod 2 = j mod 2) ‚ü∂ (HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,j) = (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô (j div 2))/(sqrt 2)^n"
and "¬¨(i mod 2 = j mod 2) ‚ü∂ (HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,j) = 0"
  using assms mod_2_is_both_even_or_odd by auto

lemma iter_tensor_of_H_tensor_Id_is_HId:
  shows "(H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1 = HId^‚á©‚äó n"
proof
  show "dim_row ((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1) = dim_row (HId^‚á©‚äó n)" 
    by (simp add: Quantum.Id_def)
  show "dim_col ((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1) = dim_col (HId^‚á©‚äó n)" 
    by (simp add: Quantum.Id_def)
next
  fix i j:: nat
  assume a0: "i < dim_row (HId^‚á©‚äó n)" and a1: "j < dim_col (HId^‚á©‚äó n)"
  then have f0: "i < (2^(n+1)) ‚àß j < (2^(n+1))" by simp
  then have "i < dim_row (H^‚á©‚äó n) * dim_row (Id 1) ‚àß j < dim_col (H^‚á©‚äó n) * dim_col (Id 1)"   
    using Id_def by simp
  moreover have "dim_col (H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚â• 0 ‚àß dim_col (Id 1) ‚â• 0"  
    using Id_def by simp
  ultimately have f1: "((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç (Id 1)) $$ (i,j) 
    = (H^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i div (dim_row (Id 1)),j div (dim_col (Id 1))) * 
      (Id 1) $$ (i mod (dim_row (Id 1)),j mod (dim_col (Id 1)))"
    by (simp add: Quantum.Id_def)
  show "((H^‚á©‚äó n)‚®ÇId 1) $$ (i,j) = (HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,j)" 
  proof (rule disjE)
    show "(i mod 2 = j mod 2) ‚à® ¬¨ (i mod 2 = j mod 2)" by simp
  next
    assume a2:"(i mod 2 = j mod 2)"
    then have "(Id 1) $$ (i mod (dim_row (Id 1)),j mod (dim_col (Id 1))) = 1" 
      by (simp add: Quantum.Id_def)
    moreover have "(H^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i div (dim_row (Id 1)), j div (dim_col (Id 1))) 
                    = (-1)^((i div (dim_row (Id 1))) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô (j div (dim_col (Id 1))))/(sqrt 2)^n" 
      using tensor_of_H_values Id_def f0 less_mult_imp_div_less by simp
    ultimately show "((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1) $$ (i,j) = (HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,j)" 
      using a2 f0 f1 Id_def by simp
  next
    assume a2: "¬¨(i mod 2 = j mod 2)" 
    then have "(Id 1) $$ (i mod (dim_row (Id 1)),j mod (dim_col (Id 1))) = 0" 
      by (simp add: Quantum.Id_def)
    then show "((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1) $$ (i,j) = (HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,j)" 
      using a2 f0 f1 by simp
  qed
qed

lemma HId_is_gate:
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "gate (n+1) (HId^‚á©‚äó n)" 
proof- 
  have "(HId^‚á©‚äó n) = (H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1" 
    using iter_tensor_of_H_tensor_Id_is_HId by simp
  moreover have "gate 1 (Id 1)" 
    using id_is_gate by simp
  moreover have "gate n (H^‚á©‚äó n)"
    using H_is_gate iter_tensor_of_gate_is_gate[of 1 H n] assms by(simp add: iter_tensor_of_H_rep_is_correct)
  ultimately show "gate (n+1) (HId^‚á©‚äó n)" 
    using tensor_gate by presburger
qed

text ‚ÄπState @{term "œà‚á©3"} is obtained by the multiplication of @{term "HId^‚á©‚äó n"} and @{term "œà‚á©2"}‚Ä∫

abbreviation (in jozsa) œà‚á©3:: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©3 ‚â° Matrix.mat (2^(n+1)) 1 (Œª(i,j). 
if even i 
  then (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^(f(k) + ((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k))/((sqrt 2)^n * (sqrt 2)^(n+1))) 
    else  (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^(f(k)+ 1 + ((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k)) /((sqrt 2)^n * (sqrt 2)^(n+1))))"

lemma (in jozsa) œà‚á©3_values:
  assumes "i < dim_row œà‚á©3"
  shows "odd i ‚ü∂ œà‚á©3 $$ (i,0) = (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^(f(k) + 1 + ((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k))/((sqrt 2)^n * (sqrt 2)^(n+1)))"
  using assms by simp

lemma (in jozsa) œà‚á©3_dim [simp]:
  shows "1 < dim_row œà‚á©3"
  using dim_row_mat(1) nat_neq_iff by fastforce

lemma sum_every_odd_summand_is_zero:
  fixes n:: nat 
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "‚àÄf::(nat ‚áí complex).(‚àÄi. i<2^(n+1) ‚àß odd i ‚ü∂ f i = 0) ‚ü∂ 
            (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^n}. f (2*k))"
  using assms
proof(rule nat_induct_at_least)
  show "‚àÄf::(nat ‚áí complex).(‚àÄi. i<2^(1+1) ‚àß odd i ‚ü∂ f i = 0) ‚ü∂
            (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(1+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk ‚àà {0..<2^1}. f (2*k))"
  proof(rule allI,rule impI)
    fix f:: "(nat ‚áí complex)"
    assume asm: "(‚àÄi. i<2^(1+1) ‚àß odd i ‚ü∂ f i = 0)" 
    moreover have "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<4}. f k) = f 0 + f 1 + f 2 + f 3" 
      by (simp add: add.commute add.left_commute)
    moreover have "f 1 = 0" 
      using asm by simp 
    moreover have "f 3 = 0" 
      using asm by simp 
    moreover have "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^1}. f (2*k)) = f 0 + f 2" 
      using add.commute add.left_commute by simp
    ultimately show "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(1+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^1}. f (2*k))" 
      by simp
  qed
next
  fix n:: nat
  assume "n ‚â• 1"
  and IH: "‚àÄf::(nat ‚áícomplex).(‚àÄi. i<2^(n+1) ‚àß odd i ‚ü∂ f i = 0) ‚ü∂
(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^n}. f (2*k))" 
  show "‚àÄf::(nat ‚áícomplex).(‚àÄi. i<2^(Suc n +1) ‚àß odd i ‚ü∂ f i = 0) ‚ü∂
(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(Suc n +1)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^(Suc n)}. f (2*k))" 
  proof (rule allI,rule impI)
    fix f::"nat ‚áí complex"
    assume asm: "(‚àÄi. i<2^(Suc n +1) ‚àß odd i ‚ü∂ f i = 0)"
    have f0: "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^n}. f (2*k))" 
      using asm IH by simp
    have f1: "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. (Œªx. f (x+2^(n+1))) k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^n}. (Œªx. f (x+2^(n+1))) (2*k))" 
      using asm IH by simp
    have "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+2)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. f k) + (‚àëk‚àà{2^(n+1)..<2^(n+2)}. f k)"
      by (simp add: sum.atLeastLessThan_concat)
    also have "... = (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^n}. f (2*k)) + (‚àëk‚àà{2^(n+1)..<2^(n+2)}. f k)"  
      using f0 by simp
    also have "... = (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^n}. f (2*k)) + (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. f (k+2^(n+1)))"  
      using sum.shift_bounds_nat_ivl[of "f" "0" "2^(n+1)" "2^(n+1)"] by simp
    also have "... = (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^n}. f (2*k)) + (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^n}. (Œªx. f (x+2^(n+1))) (2*k))"
      using f1 by simp
    also have "... = (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^n}. f (2*k)) + (‚àëk‚àà{2^n..< 2^(n+1)}. f (2 *k))"
      using sum.shift_bounds_nat_ivl[of "Œªx. (f::nat‚áícomplex) (2*(x-2^n)+2^(n+1))" "0" "2^n" "2^n"] 
      by (simp add: mult_2)
    also have "... = (‚àëk ‚àà {0..<2^(n+1)}. f (2*k))" 
      by (metis Suc_eq_plus1 lessI less_imp_le_nat one_le_numeral power_increasing sum.atLeastLessThan_concat zero_le)
    finally show "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^((Suc n)+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^(Suc n)}. f (2*k))"
      by (metis Suc_eq_plus1 add_2_eq_Suc')
  qed
qed

lemma sum_every_even_summand_is_zero:
  fixes n:: nat 
  assumes "n ‚â• 1"
  shows "‚àÄf::(nat ‚áí complex).(‚àÄi. i<2^(n+1) ‚àß even i ‚ü∂ f i = 0) ‚ü∂ 
            (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^n}. f (2*k+1))"
  using assms
proof(rule nat_induct_at_least)
  show "‚àÄf::(nat ‚áí complex).(‚àÄi. i<2^(1+1) ‚àß even i ‚ü∂ f i = 0) ‚ü∂ 
            (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(1+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^1}. f (2*k+1))"
  proof(rule allI,rule impI)
    fix f:: "nat ‚áícomplex"
    assume asm: "(‚àÄi. i<2^(1+1) ‚àß even i ‚ü∂ f i = 0)" 
    moreover have "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<4}. f k) = f 0 + f 1 + f 2 + f 3" 
      by (simp add: add.commute add.left_commute)
    moreover have "f 0 = 0" using asm by simp 
    moreover have "f 2 = 0" using asm by simp 
    moreover have "(‚àëk ‚àà {0..< 2^1}. f (2*k+1)) = f 1 + f 3" 
      using add.commute add.left_commute by simp
    ultimately show "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(1+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^1}. f (2*k+1))" by simp
  qed
next
  fix n:: nat
  assume "n ‚â• 1"
  and IH: "‚àÄf::(nat ‚áícomplex).(‚àÄi. i<2^(n+1) ‚àß even i ‚ü∂ f i = 0) ‚ü∂
(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^n}. f (2*k+1))" 
  show "‚àÄf::(nat ‚áícomplex).(‚àÄi. i<2^((Suc n)+1) ‚àß even i ‚ü∂ f i = 0) ‚ü∂
(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^((Suc n)+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^(Suc n)}. f (2*k+1))" 
  proof (rule allI,rule impI)
    fix f::"nat ‚áícomplex"
    assume asm: "(‚àÄi. i<2^((Suc n)+1) ‚àß even i ‚ü∂ f i = 0)"
    have f0: "(‚àëk ‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk ‚àà {0..< 2^n}. f (2*k+1))" 
      using asm IH by simp
    have f1: "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. (Œªx. f (x+2^(n+1))) k) 
              = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^n}. (Œªx. f (x+2^(n+1))) (2*k+1))" 
      using asm IH by simp
    have "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+2)}. f k) 
               = (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. f k) + (‚àëk‚àà{2^(n+1)..<2^(n+2)}. f k)"
      by (simp add: sum.atLeastLessThan_concat)
    also have "... = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^n}. f (2*k+1)) + (‚àëk‚àà{2^(n+1)..<2^(n+2)}. f k)"  
      using f0 by simp
    also have "... = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^n}. f (2*k+1)) + (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. f (k+(2^(n+1))))"  
      using sum.shift_bounds_nat_ivl[of "f" "0" "2^(n+1)" "2^(n+1)"] by simp
    also have "... = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^n}. f (2*k+1)) + (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^n}. (Œªx. f (x+2^(n+1))) (2*k+1))"
      using f1 by simp
    also have "... = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^n}. f (2*k+1)) + (‚àëk‚àà{2^n..< 2^(n+1)}. f (2 *k+1))"
      using sum.shift_bounds_nat_ivl[of "Œªx. (f::nat‚áícomplex) (2*(x-2^n)+1+2^(n+1))" "0" "2^n" "2^n"] 
      by (simp add: mult_2)
    also have "... = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^(n+1)}. f (2*k+1))" 
      by (metis Suc_eq_plus1 lessI less_imp_le_nat one_le_numeral power_increasing sum.atLeastLessThan_concat zero_le)
    finally show "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^((Suc n)+1)}. f k) = (‚àëk‚àà{0..< 2^(Suc n)}. f (2*k+1))"
      by (metis Suc_eq_plus1 add_2_eq_Suc')
  qed
qed

lemma (in jozsa) iter_tensor_of_H_times_œà‚á©2_is_œà‚á©3:
  shows "((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1) * œà‚á©2 = œà‚á©3"
proof
  fix i j
  assume a0:"i < dim_row œà‚á©3" and a1:"j < dim_col œà‚á©3" 
  then have f0: "i < (2^(n+1)) ‚àß j = 0" by simp
  have f1: "((HId^‚á©‚äó n)* œà‚á©2) $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk<(2^(n+1)). ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,k)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (k,j)))" 
    using a1 f0 by (simp add: atLeast0LessThan)
  show "(((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1) * œà‚á©2) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©3 $$ (i,j)"
  proof(rule disjE)
    show "even i ‚à® odd i" by simp
  next
    assume a2: "even i"
    have "(¬¨(i mod 2 = k mod 2) ‚àß k<dim_col (HId^‚á©‚äó n)) ‚ü∂ ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,k)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (k,j)) = 0" for k 
      using f0 by simp
    then have "k<(2^(n+1)) ‚àß odd k ‚ü∂ ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,k)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (k,j)) = 0" for k 
      using a2 mod_2_is_both_even_or_odd f0 by (metis (no_types, lifting) dim_col_mat(1))
    then have "(‚àëk‚àà{(0::nat)..<(2^(n+1))}. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,k)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (k,j)))
             = (‚àëk‚àà{(0::nat)..< (2^n)}. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (2*k,j)))" 
      using sum_every_odd_summand_is_zero dim by simp
    moreover have "(‚àëk<2^n. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (2*k,j))) 
                 = (‚àëk<2^n.(-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k)/(sqrt(2)^n) *((-1)^f(k))/(sqrt(2)^(n+1)))" 
    proof-
        have "(even k ‚àß k<dim_row œà‚á©2) ‚ü∂ (œà‚á©2 $$ (k,j)) = ((-1)^f(k div 2))/(sqrt(2)^(n+1))" for k 
          using a0 a1 by simp
      then have "(‚àëk<2^n. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (2*k,j))) 
               = (‚àëk<2^n. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k)) *((-1)^f((2*k) div 2))/(sqrt(2)^(n+1)))" 
        by simp
      moreover have "(even k ‚àß k<dim_col (HId^‚á©‚äó n))
                 ‚ü∂ ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,k)) = (-1)^ ((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô (k div 2))/(sqrt(2)^n)" for k
        using a2 a0 a1 by simp
      ultimately have "(‚àëk<2^n. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (2*k,j))) 
                     = (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  ((2*k) div 2))/(sqrt(2)^n) * 
                                   ((-1)^f((2*k) div 2))/(sqrt(2)^(n+1)))" 
      by simp
      then show "(‚àëk<2^n. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (2*k,j))) 
               = (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k)/(sqrt(2)^n) *((-1)^f(k))/(sqrt(2)^(n+1)))" 
        by simp
    qed
    ultimately have "((HId^‚á©‚äó n)* œà‚á©2) $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k)/(sqrt(2)^n) 
                                                        * ((-1)^f(k))/(sqrt(2)^(n+1)))" 
      using f1 by (metis atLeast0LessThan) 
    also have "... =  (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^(f(k)+((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k))/((sqrt(2)^n)*(sqrt(2)^(n+1))))" 
      by (simp add: power_add mult.commute)
    finally have "((HId^‚á©‚äó n)* œà‚á©2) $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^(f(k)+((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k))/((sqrt(2)^n)*(sqrt(2)^(n+1))))" 
       by simp
    moreover have "œà‚á©3 $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^(f(k) + ((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k))/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1)))" 
      using a0 a1 a2 by simp
    ultimately show "(((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1)* œà‚á©2) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©3 $$ (i,j)" 
      using iter_tensor_of_H_tensor_Id_is_HId dim by simp
  next
    assume a2: "odd i"
    have "(¬¨(i mod 2 = k mod 2) ‚àß k<dim_col (HId^‚á©‚äó n)) ‚ü∂ ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,k)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (k,j)) = 0" for k 
      using f0 by simp
    then have "k<(2^(n+1)) ‚àß even k ‚ü∂ ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,k)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (k,j)) = 0" for k 
      using a2 mod_2_is_both_even_or_odd f0 by (metis (no_types, lifting) dim_col_mat(1))
    then have "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^(n+1)}. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,k)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (k,j)))
             = (‚àëk‚àà{0..<2^n}. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k+1)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (2*k+1,j)))" 
      using sum_every_even_summand_is_zero dim by simp
    moreover have "(‚àëk<2^n. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k+1)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (2*k+1,j))) 
                 = (‚àë k<2^n. (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k)/(sqrt(2)^n) * ((-1)^(f(k)+1))/(sqrt(2)^(n+1)))" 
    proof-
      have "(odd k ‚àß k<dim_row œà‚á©2) ‚ü∂ (œà‚á©2 $$ (k,j)) = ((-1)^(f(k div 2)+1))/(sqrt(2)^(n+1))" for k 
        using a0 a1 a2 by simp
      then have f2:"(‚àëk<2^n. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k+1)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (2*k+1,j))) 
                  = (‚àëk<2^n. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k+1)) * ((-1)^(f((2*k+1) div 2)+1))/(sqrt(2)^(n+1)))" 
        by simp
      have "i < dim_row (HId^‚á©‚äó n)" 
        using f0 a2 mod_2_is_both_even_or_odd by simp
      then have "((i mod 2 = k mod 2) ‚àß k<dim_col (HId^‚á©‚äó n))
                 ‚ü∂ ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,k)) = (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô (k div 2))/(sqrt(2)^n) " for k
        using a2 a0 a1 f0 dim HId_values by simp
      moreover have "odd k ‚ü∂ (i mod 2 = k mod 2)" for k 
        using a2 mod_2_is_both_even_or_odd by auto
      ultimately have "(odd k ‚àß k<dim_col (HId^‚á©‚äó n))
                 ‚ü∂ ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,k)) = (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô (k div 2))/(sqrt(2)^n)" for k
        by simp
      then have "k<2^n ‚ü∂ ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k+1)) = (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô ((2*k+1) div 2))/(sqrt(2)^n) " for k
        by simp
      then have "(‚àëk<2^n. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k+1)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (2*k+1,j))) 
               = (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô ((2*k+1) div 2))/(sqrt(2)^n) 
                             * ((-1)^(f((2*k+1) div 2)+1))/(sqrt(2)^(n+1)))" 
        using f2 by simp
      then show "(‚àëk<2^n. ((HId^‚á©‚äó n) $$ (i,2*k+1)) * (œà‚á©2 $$ (2*k+1,j))) 
               = (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k)/(sqrt(2)^n) *((-1)^(f(k)+1))/(sqrt(2)^(n+1)))" 
        by simp
    qed
    ultimately have "((HId^‚á©‚äó n)* œà‚á©2) $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k)/(sqrt(2)^n) 
                * ((-1)^(f(k)+1))/(sqrt(2)^(n+1)))" 
      using f1 by (metis atLeast0LessThan) 
    also have "... = (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^(f(k)+1+((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k))/((sqrt(2)^n)*(sqrt(2)^(n+1))))"
      by (simp add: mult.commute power_add)
    finally have "((HId^‚á©‚äó n)* œà‚á©2) $$ (i,j) 
                = (‚àëk< 2^n. (-1)^(f(k)+1+((i div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k))/((sqrt(2)^n)*(sqrt(2)^(n+1))))" 
      by simp
    then show "(((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1)* œà‚á©2) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©3 $$ (i,j)" 
      using iter_tensor_of_H_tensor_Id_is_HId dim a2 a0 a1 by simp
  qed
next
  show "dim_row (((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1) * œà‚á©2) = dim_row œà‚á©3"  
    using iter_tensor_of_H_tensor_Id_is_HId dim by simp
next
  show "dim_col (((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1)* œà‚á©2) = dim_col œà‚á©3" 
    using iter_tensor_of_H_tensor_Id_is_HId dim by simp
qed

lemma (in jozsa) œà‚á©3_is_state:
  shows "state (n+1) œà‚á©3"
proof-
  have "((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1) * œà‚á©2 = œà‚á©3" 
    using iter_tensor_of_H_times_œà‚á©2_is_œà‚á©3 by simp
  moreover have "gate (n+1) ((H^‚á©‚äó n) ‚®Ç Id 1)" 
    using iter_tensor_of_H_tensor_Id_is_HId HId_is_gate dim by simp
  moreover have "state (n+1) œà‚á©2" 
    using œà‚á©2_is_state by simp
  ultimately show "state (n+1) œà‚á©3"
    using gate_on_state_is_state dim by (metis (no_types, lifting))
qed

text ‚Äπ
Finally, all steps are put together. The result depends on the function f. If f is constant
the first n qubits are 0, if f is balanced there is at least one qubit in state 1 among the 
first n qubits. 
The algorithm only uses one evaluation of f(x) and will always succeed. 
‚Ä∫

definition (in jozsa) jozsa_algo:: "complex Matrix.mat" where 
"jozsa_algo ‚â° ((H ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) ‚®Ç Id 1) * (U‚á©f * (((H ‚äó‚áón‚áñ) * ( |zero‚ü© ‚äó‚áón‚áñ)) ‚®Ç (H * |one‚ü©)))"

lemma (in jozsa) jozsa_algo_result [simp]: 
  shows "jozsa_algo = œà‚á©3" 
  using jozsa_algo_def H_on_ket_one_is_œà‚á©1‚á©1 iter_tensor_of_H_on_zero_tensor œà‚á©1‚á©0_tensor_œà‚á©1‚á©1_is_œà‚á©1
  jozsa_transform_times_œà‚á©1_is_œà‚á©2 iter_tensor_of_H_times_œà‚á©2_is_œà‚á©3 dim iter_tensor_of_H_rep_is_correct 
  by simp

lemma (in jozsa) jozsa_algo_result_is_state: 
  shows "state (n+1) jozsa_algo" 
  using œà‚á©3_is_state by simp

lemma (in jozsa) prob0_fst_qubits_of_jozsa_algo: 
  shows "(prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo) = (‚àëj‚àà{0,1}. (cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (j,0)))‚áß2)"
  using prob0_fst_qubits_eq by simp

text ‚ÄπGeneral lemmata required to compute probabilities.‚Ä∫

lemma aux_comp_with_sqrt2:
  shows "(sqrt 2)^n * (sqrt 2)^n = 2^n"
  by (smt power_mult_distrib real_sqrt_mult_self)

lemma aux_comp_with_sqrt2_bis [simp]:
  shows "2^n/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1)) = 1/sqrt 2"
  using aux_comp_with_sqrt2 by (simp add: mult.left_commute)

lemma aux_ineq_with_card: 
  fixes g:: "nat ‚áí nat" and A:: "nat set"
  assumes "finite A" 
  shows "(‚àëk‚ààA. (-1)^(g k)) ‚â§ card A" and "(‚àëk‚ààA. (-1)^(g k)) ‚â• -card A" 
   apply (smt assms neg_one_even_power neg_one_odd_power card_eq_sum of_nat_1 of_nat_sum sum_mono)
   apply (smt assms neg_one_even_power neg_one_odd_power card_eq_sum of_nat_1 of_nat_sum sum_mono sum_negf).

lemma aux_comp_with_cmod:
  fixes g:: "nat ‚áí nat"
  assumes "(‚àÄx<2^n. g x = 0) ‚à® (‚àÄx<2^n. g x = 1)"
  shows "(cmod (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^(g k)))‚áß2  = 2^(2*n)"
proof(rule disjE)
  show "(‚àÄx<2^n. g x = 0) ‚à® (‚àÄx<2^n. g x = 1)" 
    using assms by simp
next
  assume "‚àÄx<2^n. g x = 0"
  then have "(cmod (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^(g k)))‚áß2 = (2^n)‚áß2" 
    by (simp add: norm_power)
  then show "?thesis" 
    by (simp add: power_even_eq)
next 
  assume "‚àÄx<2^n. g x = 1" 
  then have "(cmod (‚àëk<2^n. (-1)^(g k)))‚áß2 = (2^n)‚áß2" 
    by (simp add: norm_power)
  then show "?thesis" 
    by (simp add: power_even_eq)
qed

lemma cmod_less:
  fixes a n:: int
  assumes "a < n" and "a > -n"
  shows "cmod a < n" 
  using assms by simp

lemma square_less:
  fixes a n:: real
  assumes "a < n" and "a > -n" 
  shows "a‚áß2 < n‚áß2"
  using assms by (smt power2_eq_iff power2_minus power_less_imp_less_base)

lemma cmod_square_real [simp]:
  fixes n:: real
  shows "(cmod n)‚áß2 = n‚áß2" 
  by simp

lemma aux_comp_sum_divide_cmod:
  fixes n:: nat and g:: "nat ‚áí int" and a:: real
  shows "(cmod(complex_of_real(‚àëk<n. g k / a)))‚áß2 = (cmod (‚àëk<n. g k) / a)‚áß2"
  by (metis cmod_square_real of_int_sum of_real_of_int_eq power_divide sum_divide_distrib)


text ‚Äπ
The function is constant if and only if the first n qubits are 0. So, if the function is constant, 
then the probability of measuring 0 for the first n qubits is 1.
‚Ä∫

lemma (in jozsa) prob0_jozsa_algo_of_const_0:
  assumes "const 0"
  shows "prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo = 1"
proof-
  have "prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo = (‚àëj‚àà{0,1}. (cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (j,0)))‚áß2)"
    using prob0_fst_qubits_of_jozsa_algo by simp
  moreover have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (0,0)))‚áß2 = 1/2"
  proof-
    have "k<2^n ‚ü∂ ((0 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k) = 0" for k::nat 
      using bitwise_inner_prod_with_zero by simp 
    then have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (0,0)))‚áß2 = (cmod(‚àëk::nat<2^n. 1/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2" 
      using jozsa_algo_result const_def assms by simp
    also have "... = (cmod((2::nat)^n/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2"  by simp
    also have "... = (cmod(1/(sqrt(2))))‚áß2" 
      using aux_comp_with_sqrt2_bis by simp
    also have "... = 1/2" 
      by (simp add: norm_divide power2_eq_square)
    finally show "?thesis" by simp
  qed
  moreover have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 = 1/2"
  proof-
    have "k<2^n ‚ü∂ ((1 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k) = 0" for k:: nat
      using bitwise_inner_prod_with_zero by simp
    then have "k<2^n ‚ü∂ f k + 1 + ((1 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k) = 1" for k::nat 
      using const_def assms by simp
    moreover have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 
    = (cmod (‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-1)^(f k + 1 + ((1 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô k))/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2"
