      using œà‚á©3_dim by simp
    ultimately have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 = (cmod(‚àëk::nat<2^n. -1/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2"
      by (smt lessThan_iff power_one_right sum.cong)
    also have "... = (cmod(-1/(sqrt(2))))‚áß2" 
      using aux_comp_with_sqrt2_bis by simp
    also have "... = 1/2" 
      by (simp add: norm_divide power2_eq_square)
    finally show "?thesis" by simp
  qed
  ultimately have "prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo = 1/2 + 1/2" by simp
  then show  "?thesis" by simp
qed

lemma (in jozsa) prob0_jozsa_algo_of_const_1:
  assumes "const 1"
  shows "prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo = 1"
proof-
  have "prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo = (‚àëj‚àà{0,1}. (cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (j,0)))‚áß2)"
    using prob0_fst_qubits_of_jozsa_algo by simp
  moreover have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (0,0)))‚áß2 = 1/2"
  proof-
     have "k<2^n ‚ü∂ ((0 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k) = 0" for k::nat
      using bitwise_inner_prod_with_zero by simp 
    then have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (0,0)))‚áß2 = (cmod(‚àëk::nat<2^n. 1/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2" 
      using jozsa_algo_result const_def assms by simp
    also have "... = (cmod((-1)/(sqrt(2))))‚áß2 " 
      using aux_comp_with_sqrt2_bis by simp
    also have "... = 1/2" 
      by (simp add: norm_divide power2_eq_square)
    finally show "?thesis" by simp
  qed
  moreover have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 = 1/2"
  proof-
    have "k<2^n ‚ü∂ ((1 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k) = 0" for k::nat
      using bitwise_inner_prod_with_zero by simp
    then have "(‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-1)^(f k +1 + ((1 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k))/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1)))
             = (‚àëk::nat<2^n. 1/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1)))"
      using const_def assms by simp
    moreover have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 
    = (cmod (‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-1)^(f k + 1 + ((1 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k))/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2"
      using  œà‚á©3_dim by simp
    ultimately have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 = (cmod(‚àëk::nat<2^n. 1/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2" by simp
    also have "... = (cmod(1/(sqrt(2))))‚áß2 " 
      using aux_comp_with_sqrt2_bis by simp
    also have "... = 1/2" 
      by (simp add: norm_divide power2_eq_square)
    finally show "?thesis" by simp
  qed
  ultimately have "prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo = 1/2 + 1/2" by simp
  then show  "?thesis" by simp
qed

text ‚ÄπIf the probability of measuring 0 for the first n qubits is 1, then the function is constant.‚Ä∫

lemma (in jozsa) max_value_of_not_const_less:
  assumes "¬¨ const 0" and "¬¨ const 1"
  shows "(cmod (‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k)))‚áß2 < (2::nat)^(2*n)"
proof-
  have "cmod (‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) < 2^n"
  proof-
    have "(‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) < 2^n"
    proof-
      obtain x where f0:"x < 2^n" and f1:"f x = 1"
        using assms(1) const_def f_values by auto
      then have "(‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) < (‚àëk‚àà{i| i:: nat. i < 2^n}-{x}. (-(1::nat))^(f k))"
      proof-
        have "(-(1::nat))^ f x = -1" using f1 by simp
        moreover have "x‚àà{i| i::nat. i<2^n}" using f0 by simp
        moreover have "finite {i| i::nat. i<2^n}" by simp
        moreover have "(‚àëk‚àà{i| i::nat. i<2^n}. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) < 
(‚àëk‚àà{i| i:: nat. i<2^n}-{x}. (-(1::nat))^(f k))"
          using calculation(1,2,3) sum_diff1 by (simp add: sum_diff1)
        ultimately show ?thesis by (metis Collect_cong Collect_mem_eq lessThan_iff)
      qed
      moreover have "‚Ä¶ ‚â§ int (2^n - 1)"
        using aux_ineq_with_card(1)[of "{i| i:: nat. i<2^n}-{x}"] f0 by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        by (meson diff_le_self less_le_trans of_nat_le_numeral_power_cancel_iff)
   qed
   moreover have "(‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) > - (2^n)"
   proof-
      obtain x where f0:"x < 2^n" and f1:"f x = 0"
        using assms(2) const_def f_values by auto
      then have "(‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) > (‚àëk‚àà{i| i:: nat. i < 2^n}-{x}. (-(1::nat))^(f k))"
      proof-
        have "(-(1::nat))^ f x = 1" using f1 by simp
        moreover have "x‚àà{i| i::nat. i<2^n}" using f0 by simp
        moreover have "finite {i| i::nat. i<2^n}" by simp
        moreover have "(‚àëk‚àà{i| i::nat. i<2^n}. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) > 
(‚àëk‚àà{i| i:: nat. i<2^n}-{x}. (-(1::nat))^(f k))"
          using calculation(1,2,3) sum_diff1 by (simp add: sum_diff1)
        ultimately show ?thesis by (metis Collect_cong Collect_mem_eq lessThan_iff)
      qed
      moreover have "- int (2^n - 1) ‚â§ (‚àëk‚àà{i| i:: nat. i < 2^n}-{x}. (-(1::nat))^(f k))"
        using aux_ineq_with_card(2)[of "{i| i:: nat. i<2^n}-{x}"] f0 by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        by (smt diff_le_self of_nat_1 of_nat_add of_nat_power_le_of_nat_cancel_iff one_add_one)
   qed
   ultimately show ?thesis
     using cmod_less of_int_of_nat_eq of_nat_numeral of_nat_power by (metis (no_types, lifting))
  qed
  then have "(cmod (‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k)))‚áß2 < (2^n)‚áß2"
    using square_less norm_ge_zero by smt
  thus ?thesis
    by (simp add: power_even_eq)
qed

lemma (in jozsa) max_value_of_not_const_less_bis:
  assumes "¬¨ const 0" and "¬¨ const 1"
  shows "(cmod (‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)))‚áß2 < (2::nat)^(2*n)"
proof-
  have "cmod (‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) < 2^n"
  proof-
    have "(‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) < 2^n"
    proof-
      obtain x where f0:"x < 2^n" and f1:"f x = 0"
        using assms(2) const_def f_values by auto
      then have "(‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) < (‚àëk‚àà{i| i:: nat. i < 2^n}-{x}. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1))"
      proof-
        have "(-(1::nat))^ (f x + 1) = -1" using f1 by simp
        moreover have "x‚àà{i| i::nat. i<2^n}" using f0 by simp
        moreover have "finite {i| i::nat. i<2^n}" by simp
        moreover have "(‚àëk‚àà{i| i::nat. i<2^n}. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) < 
(‚àëk‚àà{i| i:: nat. i<2^n}-{x}. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1))"
          using calculation(1,2,3) sum_diff1 by (simp add: sum_diff1)
        ultimately show ?thesis by (metis Collect_cong Collect_mem_eq lessThan_iff)
      qed
      moreover have "‚Ä¶ ‚â§ int (2^n - 1)"
        using aux_ineq_with_card(1)[of "{i| i:: nat. i<2^n}-{x}" "Œªk. f k + 1"] f0 by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        by (meson diff_le_self less_le_trans of_nat_le_numeral_power_cancel_iff)
   qed
   moreover have "(‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) > - (2^n)"
   proof-
      obtain x where f0:"x < 2^n" and f1:"f x = 1"
        using assms(1) const_def f_values by auto
      then have "(‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) > (‚àëk‚àà{i| i:: nat. i < 2^n}-{x}. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1))"
      proof-
        have "(-(1::nat))^ (f x + 1) = 1" using f1 by simp
        moreover have "x‚àà{i| i::nat. i<2^n}" using f0 by simp
        moreover have "finite {i| i::nat. i<2^n}" by simp
        moreover have "(‚àëk‚àà{i| i::nat. i<2^n}. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) > 
(‚àëk‚àà{i| i:: nat. i<2^n}-{x}. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1))"
          using calculation(1,2,3) sum_diff1 by (simp add: sum_diff1)
        ultimately show ?thesis by (metis Collect_cong Collect_mem_eq lessThan_iff)
      qed
      moreover have "- int (2^n - 1) ‚â§ (‚àëk‚àà{i| i:: nat. i < 2^n}-{x}. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1))"
        using aux_ineq_with_card(2)[of "{i| i:: nat. i<2^n}-{x}" "Œªk. f k + 1"] f0 by simp
      ultimately show ?thesis
        by (smt diff_le_self of_nat_1 of_nat_add of_nat_power_le_of_nat_cancel_iff one_add_one)
   qed
   ultimately show ?thesis
     using cmod_less of_int_of_nat_eq of_nat_numeral of_nat_power by (metis (no_types, lifting))
  qed
  then have "(cmod (‚àëk::nat<2^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)))‚áß2 < (2^n)‚áß2"
    using square_less norm_ge_zero by smt
  thus ?thesis
    by (simp add: power_even_eq)
qed

lemma (in jozsa) f_const_has_max_value: 
  assumes "const 0 ‚à® const 1"
  shows "(cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k)))‚áß2 = (2::nat)^(2*n)" 
  and "(cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k + 1)))‚áß2 = (2::nat)^(2*n)" 
  using aux_comp_with_cmod[of n "Œªk. f k"] aux_comp_with_cmod[of n "Œªk. f k + 1"] const_def assms by auto

lemma (in jozsa) prob0_fst_qubits_leq:
  shows "(cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k)))‚áß2 ‚â§ (2::nat)^(2*n)" 
    and "(cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k + 1)))‚áß2 ‚â§ (2::nat)^(2*n)"  
proof-
  show "(cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k)))‚áß2 ‚â§ (2::nat)^(2*n)" 
  proof(rule disjE)
    show "(const 0 ‚à® const 1) ‚à® (¬¨ const 0 ‚àß ¬¨ const 1)" by auto
  next
    assume "const 0 ‚à® const 1" 
    then show "(cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k)))‚áß2 ‚â§ (2::nat)^(2*n)" 
      using f_const_has_max_value by simp
  next
    assume "¬¨ const 0 ‚àß ¬¨ const 1"
    then show "(cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k)))‚áß2 ‚â§ (2::nat)^(2*n)" 
      using max_value_of_not_const_less by simp
  qed
next
  show "(cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k + 1)))‚áß2 ‚â§ (2::nat)^(2*n)" 
  proof(rule disjE)
    show "(const 0 ‚à® const 1) ‚à® (¬¨ const 0 ‚àß ¬¨ const 1)" by auto
  next
    assume "const 0 ‚à® const 1" 
    then show "(cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k + 1)))‚áß2 ‚â§ (2::nat)^(2*n)" 
      using f_const_has_max_value by simp
  next
    assume "¬¨ const 0 ‚àß ¬¨ const 1"
    then show "(cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k + 1)))‚áß2 ‚â§ (2::nat)^(2*n)" 
      using max_value_of_not_const_less_bis by simp
  qed
qed

lemma (in jozsa) prob0_jozsa_algo_1_is_const:
  assumes "prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo = 1"
  shows "const 0 ‚à® const 1"
proof-
  have f0: "(‚àëj‚àà{0,1}. (cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (j,0)))‚áß2) = 1"
    using prob0_fst_qubits_of_jozsa_algo assms by simp
  have "k < 2^n‚ü∂((0 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k) = 0" for k::nat
    using bitwise_inner_prod_with_zero by simp 
  then have f1: "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (0,0)))‚áß2 = (cmod(‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k)/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2" 
    by simp
  have "k < 2^n‚ü∂((1 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k) = 0" for k::nat
    using bitwise_inner_prod_with_zero by simp
  moreover have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 
               = (cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k+ 1 + ((1 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k))/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2"
      using œà‚á©3_dim by simp
  ultimately have f2: "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 
                     = (cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k + 1)/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2" by simp   
  have f3: "1 = (cmod(‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n.(-1)^(f k)/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2
        + (cmod (‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k + 1)/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2" 
    using f0 f1 f2 by simp 
  also have "... = ((cmod (‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k)) ) /(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1)))‚áß2
                 + ((cmod(‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k + 1))) /(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1)))‚áß2"
    using aux_comp_sum_divide_cmod[of "Œªk. (-1)^(f k)" "(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))" "(2::nat)^n"] 
          aux_comp_sum_divide_cmod[of "Œªk. (-1)^(f k + 1)" "(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))" "(2::nat)^n"] 
    by simp
  also have "... = ((cmod (‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k))))‚áß2 /((sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1)))‚áß2
                 + ((cmod(‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k +1))))‚áß2 /((sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1)))‚áß2"
    by (simp add: power_divide)
  also have "... = ((cmod (‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k)) ) )‚áß2/(2^(2*n+1))
                 + ((cmod(‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k + 1))))‚áß2 /(2^(2*n+1))"
    by (smt left_add_twice power2_eq_square power_add power_mult_distrib real_sqrt_pow2)
  also have "... = (((cmod (‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k))))‚áß2 
                 + ((cmod(‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k + 1))))‚áß2)/(2^(2*n+1)) "
    by (simp add: add_divide_distrib)
  finally have "((2::nat)^(2*n+1)) = (((cmod (‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k))))‚áß2 
                 + ((cmod(‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k + 1))))‚áß2)" by simp
  moreover have "((2::nat)^(2*n+1)) = 2^(2*n) + 2^(2*n)" by auto
  moreover have "(cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k)))‚áß2 ‚â§ 2^(2*n)" 
    using prob0_fst_qubits_leq by simp 
  moreover have "(cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k + 1)))‚áß2 ‚â§ 2^(2*n)" 
    using prob0_fst_qubits_leq by simp 
  ultimately have "2^(2*n) = ((cmod (‚àëk::nat<(2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k))))‚áß2" by simp
  then show ?thesis
    using  max_value_of_not_const_less by auto
qed

text ‚Äπ
The function is balanced if and only if at least one qubit among the first n qubits is not zero.
So, if the function is balanced then the probability of measuring 0 for the first n qubits is 0.
‚Ä∫

lemma sum_union_disjoint_finite_set:
  fixes C::"nat set" and g::"nat ‚áí int"
  assumes "finite C"
  shows "‚àÄA B. A ‚à© B = {} ‚àß A ‚à™ B = C ‚ü∂ (‚àëk‚ààC. g k) = (‚àëk‚ààA. g k) + (‚àëk‚ààB. g k)" 
  using assms sum.union_disjoint by auto

lemma (in jozsa) balanced_pos_and_neg_terms_cancel_out1:
  assumes "is_balanced" 
  shows "(‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) = 0"
proof-
  have "‚ãÄA B. A ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < (2::nat)^n} ‚àß B ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < (2::nat)^n}
             ‚àß card A = ((2::nat)^(n-1)) ‚àß card B = ((2::nat)^(n-1))  
             ‚àß (‚àÄ(x::nat) ‚àà A. f x = (0::nat))  ‚àß (‚àÄ(x::nat) ‚àà B. f x = 1)
        ‚ü∂ (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) = 0"
  proof
    fix A B::"nat set"
    assume asm: "A ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < (2::nat)^n} ‚àß B ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < (2::nat)^n}
             ‚àß card A = ((2::nat)^(n-1)) ‚àß card B = ((2::nat)^(n-1))  
             ‚àß (‚àÄ(x::nat) ‚àà A. f x = (0::nat))  ‚àß (‚àÄ(x::nat) ‚àà B. f x = 1)" 
    then have " A ‚à© B = {}" and "{0..<(2::nat)^n} = A ‚à™ B" 
      using is_balanced_union is_balanced_inter by auto
    then have "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<(2::nat)^n}. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) =
               (‚àëk‚ààA. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) 
             + (‚àëk‚ààB. (-(1::nat))^(f k))" 
      by (metis finite_atLeastLessThan sum_union_disjoint_finite_set)
    moreover have "(‚àëk‚ààA. (-1)^(f k)) = ((2::nat)^(n-1))"
      using asm by simp
    moreover have "(‚àëk‚ààB. (-1)^(f k)) = -((2::nat)^(n-1))" 
      using asm by simp
    ultimately have "(‚àëk‚àà {0..<(2::nat)^n}. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) = 0" by simp
    then show "(‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k)) = 0"
      by (simp add: lessThan_atLeast0)
  qed
  then show ?thesis 
    using assms is_balanced_def by auto
qed

lemma (in jozsa) balanced_pos_and_neg_terms_cancel_out2:
  assumes "is_balanced" 
  shows "(‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) = 0"
proof-
  have "‚ãÄA B. A ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < (2::nat)^n} ‚àß B ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < (2::nat)^n}
             ‚àß card A = ((2::nat)^(n-1)) ‚àß card B = ((2::nat)^(n-1))  
             ‚àß (‚àÄ(x::nat)‚ààA. f x = (0::nat))  ‚àß (‚àÄ(x::nat)‚ààB. f x = 1)
        ‚ü∂ (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) = 0"
  proof
    fix A B::"nat set"
    assume asm: "A ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < (2::nat)^n} ‚àß B ‚äÜ {i::nat. i < (2::nat)^n}
             ‚àß card A = ((2::nat)^(n-1)) ‚àß card B = ((2::nat)^(n-1))  
             ‚àß (‚àÄ(x::nat) ‚àà A. f x = (0::nat))  ‚àß (‚àÄ(x::nat) ‚àà B. f x = 1)" 
    have "A ‚à© B = {}" and "{0..<(2::nat)^n} = A ‚à™ B" 
      using is_balanced_union is_balanced_inter asm by auto
    then have "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<(2::nat)^n}. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) =
               (‚àëk‚ààA. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) 
             + (‚àëk‚ààB. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1))" 
      by (metis finite_atLeastLessThan sum_union_disjoint_finite_set)
    moreover have "(‚àëk‚ààA. (-1)^(f k + 1)) = -((2::nat)^(n-1))" 
      using asm by simp
    moreover have "(‚àëk‚ààB. (-1)^(f k + 1)) = ((2::nat)^(n-1))" 
      using asm by simp
    ultimately have "(‚àëk‚àà{0..<(2::nat)^n}. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) = 0 " by simp
    then show "(‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) = 0"
      by (simp add: lessThan_atLeast0)
  qed
  then show "(‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)) = 0" 
    using assms is_balanced_def by auto
qed

lemma (in jozsa) prob0_jozsa_algo_of_balanced:
assumes "is_balanced"
  shows "prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo = 0"
proof-
  have "prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo = (‚àëj‚àà{0,1}. (cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (j,0)))‚áß2)"
    using prob0_fst_qubits_of_jozsa_algo by simp
  moreover have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (0,0)))‚áß2 = 0"
  proof-
     have "k < 2^n‚ü∂((1 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k) = 0" for k::nat
      using bitwise_inner_prod_with_zero by simp
    then have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (0,0)))‚áß2 = (cmod(‚àë k < (2::nat)^n. (-1)^(f k)/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2" 
      using œà‚á©3_values by simp
    also have "... = (cmod(‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k))/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1)))‚áß2" 
      using aux_comp_sum_divide_cmod[of "Œªk.(-(1::nat))^(f k)" "(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))" "2^n"] 
      by simp
    also have "... = (cmod ((0::int)/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2" 
      using balanced_pos_and_neg_terms_cancel_out1 assms by (simp add: bob_fun_axioms)
    also have "... = 0" by simp
    finally show ?thesis by simp
  qed
  moreover have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 = 0" 
  proof-
     have "k < 2^n ‚ü∂ (((1::nat) div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k) = 0" for k::nat
       using bitwise_inner_prod_with_zero by auto
     moreover have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 
     = (cmod (‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + (1::nat) + ((1 div 2) ‚ãÖ‚áòn‚áô  k))/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2"
      using œà‚á©3_dim by simp
    ultimately have "(cmod(jozsa_algo $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 
    = (cmod(‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + (1::nat))/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2" 
       by simp
    also have "... = (cmod(‚àëk<(2::nat)^n. (-(1::nat))^(f k + 1))/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1)))‚áß2" 
      using aux_comp_sum_divide_cmod[of "Œªk.(-(1::nat))^(f k + 1)" "(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))" "2^n"] 
      by simp
    also have "... = (cmod ((0::int)/(sqrt(2)^n * sqrt(2)^(n+1))))‚áß2" 
      using balanced_pos_and_neg_terms_cancel_out2 assms by (simp add: bob_fun_axioms)
    also have "... = 0" by simp
    finally show ?thesis by simp
  qed
  ultimately have "prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo = 0 + 0" by simp
  then show  ?thesis by simp
qed

text ‚ÄπIf the probability that the first n qubits are 0 is 0, then the function is balanced.‚Ä∫

lemma (in jozsa) balanced_prob0_jozsa_algo:
  assumes "prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo = 0"
  shows "is_balanced"
proof-
  have "is_const ‚à® is_balanced" 
    using const_or_balanced by simp
  moreover have "is_const ‚ü∂ ¬¨ prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo = 0"
    using is_const_def prob0_jozsa_algo_of_const_0 prob0_jozsa_algo_of_const_1 by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    using assms by simp
qed

text ‚ÄπWe prove the correctness of the algorithm.‚Ä∫

definition (in jozsa) jozsa_algo_eval:: "real" where
"jozsa_algo_eval ‚â° prob0_fst_qubits n jozsa_algo"

theorem (in jozsa) jozsa_algo_is_correct:
  shows "jozsa_algo_eval = 1 ‚ü∑ is_const" 
    and "jozsa_algo_eval = 0 ‚ü∑ is_balanced" 
  using prob0_jozsa_algo_of_const_1 prob0_jozsa_algo_of_const_0 jozsa_algo_eval_def
prob0_jozsa_algo_1_is_const is_const_def balanced_prob0_jozsa_algo prob0_jozsa_algo_of_balanced 
  by auto

end

Theory No_Cloning

(*
Authors:

  Anthony Bordg, University of Cambridge, apdb3@cam.ac.uk;
  Yijun He, University of Cambridge, yh403@cam.ac.uk
*)

section ‚ÄπThe No-Cloning Theorem‚Ä∫

theory No_Cloning
imports
  Quantum
  Tensor
begin


subsection ‚ÄπThe Cauchy-Schwarz Inequality‚Ä∫

lemma inner_prod_expand:
  assumes "dim_vec a = dim_vec b" and "dim_vec a = dim_vec c" and "dim_vec a = dim_vec d"
  shows "‚ü®a + b|c + d‚ü© = ‚ü®a|c‚ü© + ‚ü®a|d‚ü© + ‚ü®b|c‚ü© + ‚ü®b|d‚ü©"
    apply (simp add: inner_prod_def)
    using assms sum.cong by (simp add: sum.distrib algebra_simps)

lemma inner_prod_distrib_left:
  assumes "dim_vec a = dim_vec b"
  shows "‚ü®c ‚ãÖ‚á©v a|b‚ü© = cnj(c) * ‚ü®a|b‚ü©"
  using assms inner_prod_def by (simp add: algebra_simps mult_hom.hom_sum)

lemma inner_prod_distrib_right:
  assumes "dim_vec a = dim_vec b"
  shows "‚ü®a|c ‚ãÖ‚á©v b‚ü© = c * ‚ü®a|b‚ü©"
  using assms by (simp add: algebra_simps mult_hom.hom_sum)

lemma cauchy_schwarz_ineq:
  assumes "dim_vec v = dim_vec w"
  shows "(cmod(‚ü®v|w‚ü©))‚áß2 ‚â§ Re (‚ü®v|v‚ü© * ‚ü®w|w‚ü©)"
proof (cases "‚ü®v|v‚ü© = 0")
  case c0:True
  then have "‚ãÄi. i < dim_vec v ‚üπ v $ i = 0"
    by(metis index_zero_vec(1) inner_prod_with_itself_nonneg_reals_non0)
  then have "(cmod(‚ü®v|w‚ü©))‚áß2 = 0" by (simp add: assms inner_prod_def)
  moreover have "Re (‚ü®v|v‚ü© * ‚ü®w|w‚ü©) = 0" by (simp add: c0)
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
next
  case c1:False
  have "dim_vec w = dim_vec (- ‚ü®v|w‚ü© / ‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v)" by (simp add: assms)
  then have "‚ü®w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü© = ‚ü®w|w‚ü© + ‚ü®w|-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü© +
‚ü®-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|w‚ü© + ‚ü®-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü©"
    using inner_prod_expand[of "w" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v" "w" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v"] by auto
  moreover have "‚ü®w|-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü© = -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© * ‚ü®w|v‚ü©"
    using assms inner_prod_distrib_right[of "w" "v" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©"] by simp
  moreover have "‚ü®-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|w‚ü© = cnj(-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©) * ‚ü®v|w‚ü©"
    using assms inner_prod_distrib_left[of "v" "w" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©"] by simp
  moreover have "‚ü®-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü© = cnj(-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©) * (-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©) * ‚ü®v|v‚ü©"
    using inner_prod_distrib_left[of "v" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©"]
inner_prod_distrib_right[of "v" "v" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©"] by simp
  ultimately have "‚ü®w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü© = ‚ü®w|w‚ü© -  cmod(‚ü®v|w‚ü©)^2 / ‚ü®v|v‚ü©"
    using assms inner_prod_cnj[of "w" "v"] inner_prod_cnj[of "v" "v"] complex_norm_square by simp
  moreover have "Re(‚ü®w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü©) ‚â• 0"
    using inner_prod_with_itself_Re by blast
  ultimately have "Re(‚ü®w|w‚ü©) ‚â• cmod(‚ü®v|w‚ü©)^2/Re(‚ü®v|v‚ü©)"
    using inner_prod_with_itself_real by simp
  moreover have c2:"Re(‚ü®v|v‚ü©) > 0"
    using inner_prod_with_itself_Re_non0 inner_prod_with_itself_eq0 c1 by auto
  ultimately have "Re(‚ü®w|w‚ü©) * Re(‚ü®v|v‚ü©) ‚â• cmod(‚ü®v|w‚ü©)^2/Re(‚ü®v|v‚ü©) * Re(‚ü®v|v‚ü©)"
    by (metis less_numeral_extra(3) nonzero_divide_eq_eq pos_divide_le_eq)
  thus ?thesis
    using inner_prod_with_itself_Im c2 by (simp add: mult.commute)
qed

lemma cauchy_schwarz_eq [simp]:
  assumes "v = (l ‚ãÖ‚á©v w)"
  shows "(cmod(‚ü®v|w‚ü©))‚áß2 = Re (‚ü®v|v‚ü© * ‚ü®w|w‚ü©)"
proof-
  have "cmod(‚ü®v|w‚ü©) = cmod(cnj(l) * ‚ü®w|w‚ü©)"
    using assms inner_prod_distrib_left[of "w" "w" "l"] by simp
  then have "cmod(‚ü®v|w‚ü©)^2 = cmod(l)^2 * ‚ü®w|w‚ü© * ‚ü®w|w‚ü©"
    using complex_norm_square inner_prod_cnj[of "w" "w"] by simp
  moreover have "‚ü®v|v‚ü© = cmod(l)^2 * ‚ü®w|w‚ü©"
    using assms complex_norm_square inner_prod_distrib_left[of "w" "v" "l"]
inner_prod_distrib_right[of "w" "w" "l"] by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by (metis Re_complex_of_real)
qed

lemma cauchy_schwarz_col [simp]:
  assumes "dim_vec v = dim_vec w" and "(cmod(‚ü®v|w‚ü©))‚áß2 = Re (‚ü®v|v‚ü© * ‚ü®w|w‚ü©)"
  shows "‚àÉl. v = (l ‚ãÖ‚á©v w) ‚à® w = (l ‚ãÖ‚á©v v)"
proof (cases "‚ü®v|v‚ü© = 0")
  case c0:True
  then have "‚ãÄi. i < dim_vec v ‚üπ v $ i = 0"
    by(metis index_zero_vec(1) inner_prod_with_itself_nonneg_reals_non0)
  then have "v = 0 ‚ãÖ‚á©v w" by (auto simp: assms)
  then show ?thesis by auto
next
  case c1:False
  have f0:"dim_vec w = dim_vec (- ‚ü®v|w‚ü© / ‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v)" by (simp add: assms(1))
  then have "‚ü®w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü© = ‚ü®w|w‚ü© + ‚ü®w|-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü© +
‚ü®-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|w‚ü© + ‚ü®-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü©"
    using inner_prod_expand[of "w" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v" "w" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v"] by simp
  moreover have "‚ü®w|-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü© = -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© * ‚ü®w|v‚ü©"
    using assms(1) inner_prod_distrib_right[of "w" "v" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©"] by simp
  moreover have "‚ü®-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|w‚ü© = cnj(-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©) * ‚ü®v|w‚ü©"
    using assms(1) inner_prod_distrib_left[of "v" "w" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©"] by simp
  moreover have "‚ü®-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü© = cnj(-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©) * (-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©) * ‚ü®v|v‚ü©"
    using inner_prod_distrib_left[of "v" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©"]
inner_prod_distrib_right[of "v" "v" "-‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü©"] by simp
  ultimately have "‚ü®w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü© = ‚ü®w|w‚ü© -  cmod(‚ü®v|w‚ü©)^2 / ‚ü®v|v‚ü©"
    using inner_prod_cnj[of "w" "v"] inner_prod_cnj[of "v" "v"] assms(1) complex_norm_square by simp
  moreover have "‚ü®w|w‚ü© = cmod(‚ü®v|w‚ü©)^2 / ‚ü®v|v‚ü©"
    using assms(2) inner_prod_with_itself_real by(metis Reals_mult c1 nonzero_mult_div_cancel_left of_real_Re)
  ultimately have "‚ü®w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v|w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v‚ü© = 0" by simp
  then have "‚ãÄi. i<dim_vec w ‚üπ (w + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v) $ i = 0"
    by (metis f0 index_add_vec(2) index_zero_vec(1) inner_prod_with_itself_nonneg_reals_non0)
  then have "‚ãÄi. i<dim_vec w ‚üπ w $ i + -‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© * v $ i = 0"
    by (metis assms(1) f0 index_add_vec(1) index_smult_vec(1))
  then have "‚ãÄi. i<dim_vec w ‚üπ w $ i = ‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© * v $ i" by simp
  then have "w = ‚ü®v|w‚ü©/‚ü®v|v‚ü© ‚ãÖ‚á©v v" by (auto simp add: assms(1))
  thus ?thesis by auto
qed

subsection ‚ÄπThe No-Cloning Theorem‚Ä∫

lemma eq_from_inner_prod [simp]:
  assumes "dim_vec v = dim_vec w" and "‚ü®v|w‚ü© = 1" and "‚ü®v|v‚ü© = 1" and "‚ü®w|w‚ü© = 1"
  shows "v = w"
proof-
  have "(cmod(‚ü®v|w‚ü©))‚áß2 = Re (‚ü®v|v‚ü© * ‚ü®w|w‚ü©)" by (simp add: assms)
  then have f0:"‚àÉl. v = (l ‚ãÖ‚á©v w) ‚à® w = (l ‚ãÖ‚á©v v)" by (simp add: assms(1))
  then show ?thesis
  proof (cases "‚àÉl. v = (l ‚ãÖ‚á©v w)")
    case True
    then have "‚àÉl. v = (l ‚ãÖ‚á©v w) ‚àß ‚ü®v|w‚ü© = cnj(l) * ‚ü®w|w‚ü©"
      using inner_prod_distrib_left by auto
    then show ?thesis by (simp add: assms(2,4))
  next
    case False
    then have "‚àÉl. w = (l ‚ãÖ‚á©v v) ‚àß ‚ü®v|w‚ü© = l * ‚ü®v|v‚ü©"
      using f0 inner_prod_distrib_right by auto
    then show ?thesis by (simp add: assms(2,3))
  qed
qed

lemma hermite_cnj_of_tensor:
  shows "(A ‚®Ç B)‚áß‚Ä†  = (A‚áß‚Ä†) ‚®Ç (B‚áß‚Ä†)"
proof
  show c0:"dim_row ((A ‚®Ç B)‚áß‚Ä†) = dim_row ((A‚áß‚Ä†) ‚®Ç (B‚áß‚Ä†))" by simp
  show c1:"dim_col ((A ‚®Ç B)‚áß‚Ä†) = dim_col ((A‚áß‚Ä†) ‚®Ç (B‚áß‚Ä†))" by simp
  show "‚ãÄi j. i < dim_row ((A‚áß‚Ä†) ‚®Ç (B‚áß‚Ä†)) ‚üπ j < dim_col ((A‚áß‚Ä†) ‚®Ç (B‚áß‚Ä†)) ‚üπ
((A ‚®Ç B)‚áß‚Ä†) $$ (i, j) = ((A‚áß‚Ä†) ‚®Ç (B‚áß‚Ä†)) $$ (i, j)"
  proof-
    fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row ((A‚áß‚Ä†) ‚®Ç (B‚áß‚Ä†))" and a1:"j < dim_col ((A‚áß‚Ä†) ‚®Ç (B‚áß‚Ä†))"
    then have "(A ‚®Ç B)‚áß‚Ä† $$ (i, j) = cnj((A ‚®Ç B) $$ (j, i))" by (simp add: dagger_def)
    also have "‚Ä¶ = cnj(A $$ (j div dim_row(B), i div dim_col(B)) * B $$ (j mod dim_row(B), i mod dim_col(B)))"
      by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) a0 a1 c1 dim_row_tensor_mat dim_col_of_dagger dim_row_of_dagger
index_tensor_mat less_nat_zero_code mult_not_zero neq0_conv)
    moreover have "((A‚áß‚Ä†) ‚®Ç (B‚áß‚Ä†)) $$ (i, j) =
(A‚áß‚Ä†) $$ (i div dim_col(B), j div dim_row(B)) * (B‚áß‚Ä†) $$ (i mod dim_col(B), j mod dim_row(B))"
      by (smt a0 a1 c1 dim_row_tensor_mat dim_col_of_dagger dim_row_of_dagger index_tensor_mat
less_nat_zero_code mult_eq_0_iff neq0_conv)
    moreover have "(B‚áß‚Ä†) $$ (i mod dim_col(B), j mod dim_row(B)) = cnj(B $$ (j mod dim_row(B), i mod dim_col(B)))"
    proof-
      have "i mod dim_col(B) < dim_col(B)"
        using a0 gr_implies_not_zero mod_div_trivial by fastforce
      moreover have "j mod dim_row(B) < dim_row(B)"
        using a1 gr_implies_not_zero mod_div_trivial by fastforce
      ultimately show ?thesis by (simp add: dagger_def)
    qed
    moreover have "(A‚áß‚Ä†) $$ (i div dim_col(B), j div dim_row(B)) = cnj(A $$ (j div dim_row(B), i div dim_col(B)))"
    proof-
      have "i div dim_col(B) < dim_col(A)"
        using a0 dagger_def by (simp add: less_mult_imp_div_less)
      moreover have "j div dim_row(B) < dim_row(A)"
        using a1 dagger_def by (simp add: less_mult_imp_div_less)
      ultimately show ?thesis by (simp add: dagger_def)
    qed
    ultimately show "((A ‚®Ç B)‚áß‚Ä†) $$ (i, j) = ((A‚áß‚Ä†) ‚®Ç (B‚áß‚Ä†)) $$ (i, j)" by simp
  qed
qed

locale quantum_machine =
  fixes n:: nat and s:: "complex Matrix.vec" and U:: "complex Matrix.mat"
  assumes dim_vec [simp]: "dim_vec s = 2^n"
    and dim_col [simp]: "dim_col U = 2^n * 2^n"
    and square [simp]: "square_mat U" and unitary [simp]: "unitary U"

lemma inner_prod_of_unit_vec:
  fixes n i:: nat
  assumes "i < n"
  shows "‚ü®unit_vec n i| unit_vec n i‚ü© = 1"
  by (auto simp add: inner_prod_def unit_vec_def)
    (simp add: assms sum.cong[of "{0..<n}" "{0..<n}"
        "Œªj. cnj (if j = i then 1 else 0) * (if j = i then 1 else 0)" "Œªj. (if j = i then 1 else 0)"])

theorem (in quantum_machine) no_cloning:
  assumes [simp]: "dim_vec v = 2^n" and [simp]: "dim_vec w = 2^n" and
    cloning1: "‚ãÄs. U * ( |v‚ü© ‚®Ç |s‚ü©) = |v‚ü© ‚®Ç |v‚ü©" and
    cloning2: "‚ãÄs. U * ( |w‚ü© ‚®Ç |s‚ü©) = |w‚ü© ‚®Ç |w‚ü©" and
    "‚ü®v|v‚ü© = 1" and "‚ü®w|w‚ü© = 1"
  shows "v = w ‚à® ‚ü®v|w‚ü© = 0"
proof-
  define s:: "complex Matrix.vec" where d0:"s = unit_vec (2^n) 0"
  have f0:"‚ü®|v‚ü©| ‚®Ç ‚ü®|s‚ü©| = (( |v‚ü© ‚®Ç |s‚ü©)‚áß‚Ä†)"
    using hermite_cnj_of_tensor[of "|v‚ü©" "|s‚ü©"] bra_def dagger_def ket_vec_def by simp
  moreover have f1:"( |v‚ü© ‚®Ç |v‚ü©)‚áß‚Ä† * ( |w‚ü© ‚®Ç |w‚ü©) = (‚ü®|v‚ü©| ‚®Ç ‚ü®|s‚ü©| ) * ( |w‚ü© ‚®Ç |s‚ü©)"
  proof-
    have "(U * ( |v‚ü© ‚®Ç |s‚ü©))‚áß‚Ä† = (‚ü®|v‚ü©| ‚®Ç ‚ü®|s‚ü©| ) * (U‚áß‚Ä†)"
      using dagger_of_prod[of "U" "|v‚ü© ‚®Ç |s‚ü©"] f0 d0 by (simp add: ket_vec_def)
    then have "(U * ( |v‚ü© ‚®Ç |s‚ü©))‚áß‚Ä† * U * ( |w‚ü© ‚®Ç |s‚ü©) = (‚ü®|v‚ü©| ‚®Ç ‚ü®|s‚ü©| ) * (U‚áß‚Ä†) * U * ( |w‚ü© ‚®Ç |s‚ü©)" by simp
    moreover have "(U * ( |v‚ü© ‚®Ç |s‚ü©))‚áß‚Ä† * U * ( |w‚ü© ‚®Ç |s‚ü©) = (( |v‚ü© ‚®Ç |v‚ü©)‚áß‚Ä†) * ( |w‚ü© ‚®Ç |w‚ü©)"
      using assms(2-4) d0 unit_vec_def by (smt Matrix.dim_vec assoc_mult_mat carrier_mat_triv dim_row_mat(1)
dim_row_tensor_mat dim_col_of_dagger index_mult_mat(2) ket_vec_def square square_mat.elims(2))
    moreover have "(U‚áß‚Ä†) * U = 1‚á©m (2^n * 2^n)"
      using unitary_def dim_col unitary by simp
    moreover have "(‚ü®|v‚ü©| ‚®Ç ‚ü®|s‚ü©| ) * (U‚áß‚Ä†) * U = (‚ü®|v‚ü©| ‚®Ç ‚ü®|s‚ü©| ) * ((U‚áß‚Ä†) * U)"
      using d0 assms(1) unit_vec_def by (smt Matrix.dim_vec assoc_mult_mat carrier_mat_triv dim_row_mat(1)
dim_row_tensor_mat f0 dim_col_of_dagger dim_row_of_dagger ket_vec_def local.dim_col)
    moreover have "(‚ü®|v‚ü©| ‚®Ç ‚ü®|s‚ü©| ) * 1‚á©m (2^n * 2^n) = (‚ü®|v‚ü©| ‚®Ç ‚ü®|s‚ü©| )"
      using f0 ket_vec_def d0 by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis by simp
  qed
  then have f2:"(‚ü®|v‚ü©| * |w‚ü©) ‚®Ç (‚ü®|v‚ü©| * |w‚ü©) = (‚ü®|v‚ü©| * |w‚ü©) ‚®Ç (‚ü®|s‚ü©| * |s‚ü©)"
  proof-
    have "‚ü®|v‚ü©| ‚®Ç ‚ü®|v‚ü©| = (( |v‚ü© ‚®Ç |v‚ü©)‚áß‚Ä†)"
      using hermite_cnj_of_tensor[of "|v‚ü©" "|v‚ü©"] bra_def dagger_def ket_vec_def by simp
    then show ?thesis
      using f1 d0 by (simp add: bra_def mult_distr_tensor ket_vec_def)
  qed
  then have "‚ü®v|w‚ü© * ‚ü®v|w‚ü© = ‚ü®v|w‚ü© * ‚ü®s|s‚ü©"
  proof-
    have "((‚ü®|v‚ü©| * |w‚ü©) ‚®Ç (‚ü®|v‚ü©| * |w‚ü©)) $$ (0,0) = ‚ü®v|w‚ü© * ‚ü®v|w‚ü©"
      using assms inner_prod_with_times_mat[of "v" "w"] by (simp add: bra_def ket_vec_def)
    moreover have "((‚ü®|v‚ü©| * |w‚ü©) ‚®Ç (‚ü®|s‚ü©| * |s‚ü©)) $$ (0,0) = ‚ü®v|w‚ü© * ‚ü®s|s‚ü©"
      using inner_prod_with_times_mat[of "v" "w"] inner_prod_with_times_mat[of "s" "s"] by(simp add: bra_def ket_vec_def)
    ultimately show ?thesis using f2 by auto
  qed
  then have "‚ü®v|w‚ü© = 0 ‚à® ‚ü®v|w‚ü© = ‚ü®s|s‚ü©" by (simp add: mult_left_cancel)
  moreover have "‚ü®s|s‚ü© = 1" by(simp add: d0 inner_prod_of_unit_vec)
  ultimately show ?thesis using assms(1,2,5,6) by auto
qed

end

Theory Quantum_Prisoners_Dilemma

(*
authors:
  Yijun He, University of Cambridge, yh403@cam.ac.uk
  with contributions by Anthony Bordg and Hanna Lachnitt.
*)

section ‚ÄπQuantum Prisoner's Dilemma‚Ä∫

theory Quantum_Prisoners_Dilemma
imports
  More_Tensor
  Measurement
  Basics
begin


text ‚Äπ
In the 2-parameter strategic space of Eisert, Wilkens and Lewenstein [EWL], Prisoner's Dilemma 
ceases to pose a dilemma if quantum strategies are allowed for. Indeed, Alice and Bob both choosing 
to defect is no longer a Nash equilibrium. However, a new Nash equilibrium appears which is at the 
same time Pareto optimal. Moreover, there exists a quantum strategy which always gives reward if 
played against any classical strategy. 
Below the parameter @{text "Œ≥"} can be seen as a measure of the game's entanglement. The game behaves 
classically if @{text "Œ≥"} = 0, and for the maximally entangled case (@{text "Œ≥"} = 2*$\pi$) the dilemma disappears
as pointed out above.   
‚Ä∫


subsection ‚ÄπThe Set-Up‚Ä∫

locale prisoner =
  fixes Œ≥:: "real" 
  assumes "Œ≥ ‚â§ pi/2" and "Œ≥ ‚â• 0"

abbreviation (in prisoner) J :: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"J ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 4  [[cos(Œ≥/2), 0, 0, ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)],
                          [0, cos(Œ≥/2), -ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2), 0],
                          [0, -ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2), cos(Œ≥/2), 0],
                          [ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2), 0, 0, cos(Œ≥/2)]]"

abbreviation (in prisoner) œà‚á©1 :: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©1 ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 4 [[cos(Œ≥/2), 0, 0, ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)]]"

lemma (in prisoner) psi_one:
  shows "J * |unit_vec 4 0‚ü© = œà‚á©1"
proof
  fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row œà‚á©1" and a1:"j < dim_col œà‚á©1"      
  then have "(J * |unit_vec 4 0‚ü©) $$ (i,j) = (‚àëk<4. (J $$ (i,k)) * ( |unit_vec 4 0‚ü© $$ (k,j)))" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def ket_vec_def by auto
  also have "... = (‚àëk‚àà{0,1,2,3}. (J $$ (i,k)) * ( |unit_vec 4 0‚ü© $$ (k,j)))" 
    using set_4 atLeast0LessThan by simp
  also have "... = œà‚á©1 $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1,2,3} ‚àß j=0" 
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
  qed
  finally show "(J * |unit_vec 4 0‚ü©) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©1 $$ (i,j)" by simp
next 
  show  "dim_row (J * |unit_vec 4 0‚ü©) = dim_row œà‚á©1"  
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
next
  show  "dim_col (J*|unit_vec 4 0‚ü©) = dim_col œà‚á©1"  
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by (simp add: ket_vec_def)
qed

locale strategic_space_2p = prisoner +
  fixes Œ∏‚á©A:: "real"
    and œÜ‚á©A:: "real" 
    and Œ∏‚á©B:: "real"
    and œÜ‚á©B:: "real"
  assumes "0 ‚â§ Œ∏‚á©A ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A ‚â§ pi"
      and "0 ‚â§ œÜ‚á©A ‚àß œÜ‚á©A ‚â§ pi/2"
      and "0 ‚â§ Œ∏‚á©B ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B ‚â§ pi"
      and "0 ‚â§ œÜ‚á©B ‚àß œÜ‚á©B ‚â§ pi/2"

abbreviation (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©A :: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"U‚á©A ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 2 [[exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2), -sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2)],
                           [sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2), exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2)]]"

abbreviation (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©B :: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"U‚á©B ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 2 [[exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2), -sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2)],
                           [sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2), exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2)]]"

abbreviation (in strategic_space_2p) œà‚á©2 :: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©2 ‚â° 
mat_of_cols_list 4 [[exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * cos(Œ≥/2) + sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2),
                     exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * -sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * cos(Œ≥/2) + sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2),
                     -sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * cos(Œ≥/2) + exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2),
                     sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * cos(Œ≥/2) + exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)]]"

abbreviation (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©A‚á©B :: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"U‚á©A‚á©B ‚â° 
mat_of_cols_list 4 [[exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2), exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * -sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2),
                            -sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2), -sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * -sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2)],
                    [exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2), exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2),
                            -sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2), -sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2)],
                    [sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2), -sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2),
                            exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp (ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2), exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * -sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2)],
                    [sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2), sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2),
                            exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2), exp (-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2)]]"

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©A_tensor_U‚á©B:
  shows "(U‚á©A ‚®Ç U‚á©B) = U‚á©A‚á©B"
proof
  fix i j assume a0: "i<dim_row U‚á©A‚á©B" and a1: "j<dim_col U‚á©A‚á©B"
  then have "i‚àà{0,1,2,3} ‚àß j‚àà{0,1,2,3}"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
  then show "(U‚á©A ‚®Ç U‚á©B) $$ (i,j) = U‚á©A‚á©B $$ (i,j)"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
next
  show "dim_row (U‚á©A ‚®Ç U‚á©B) = dim_row U‚á©A‚á©B" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
next
  show "dim_col (U‚á©A ‚®Ç U‚á©B) = dim_col U‚á©A‚á©B" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) psi_two:
  shows "(U‚á©A ‚®Ç U‚á©B) * œà‚á©1 = œà‚á©2"
proof
  fix i j
  assume a0:"i < dim_row œà‚á©2" and a1:"j < dim_col œà‚á©2"
  then show "((U‚á©A ‚®Ç U‚á©B) * œà‚á©1) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©2 $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1,2,3} ‚àß j=0" 
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def U‚á©A_tensor_U‚á©B set_4 by auto
  qed
next
  show "dim_row ((U‚á©A ‚®Ç U‚á©B)*œà‚á©1) = dim_row œà‚á©2" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp 
next
  show "dim_col ((U‚á©A ‚®Ç U‚á©B)*œà‚á©1) = dim_col œà‚á©2" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp  
qed

abbreviation (in prisoner) J_cnj :: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"J_cnj ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 4 [[cos(Œ≥/2), 0, 0, -ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)],
                             [0, cos(Œ≥/2), ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2), 0],
                             [0, ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2), cos(Œ≥/2), 0],
                             [-ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2), 0, 0, cos(Œ≥/2)]]"

lemma (in prisoner) hermite_cnj_of_J [simp]:
  shows "J‚áß‚Ä† = J_cnj"
proof
  fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row J_cnj" and a1:"j < dim_col J_cnj"
  then show "J‚áß‚Ä† $$ (i,j) = J_cnj $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1,2,3} ‚àß j‚àà{0,1,2,3}" 
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def dagger_def by auto
  qed
next
  show "dim_row (J‚áß‚Ä†) = dim_row J_cnj" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
next
  show "dim_col (J‚áß‚Ä†) = dim_col J_cnj" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
qed

abbreviation (in strategic_space_2p) œà‚á©f :: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"œà‚á©f ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 4 [[
cos(Œ≥/2) * (exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * cos(Œ≥/2) + sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2))
+ (-ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)) * (sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * cos(Œ≥/2) + exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)),

cos(Œ≥/2) * (exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * -sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * cos(Œ≥/2) + sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)) 
+ (ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)) * (-sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * cos(Œ≥/2) + exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)),

(ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)) * (exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * -sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * cos(Œ≥/2) + sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2))
+ cos(Œ≥/2) * (-sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * cos(Œ≥/2) + exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)),

(-ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)) * (exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * cos(Œ≥/2) + sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2)) 
+ cos(Œ≥/2) * (sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * cos(Œ≥/2) + exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A)*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2) * exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B)*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2) * ùóÇ*sin(Œ≥/2))
]]"

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) psi_f:
  shows "(J‚áß‚Ä†) * œà‚á©2 = œà‚á©f"
proof
  fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row œà‚á©f" and a1:"j < dim_col œà‚á©f"
  then show "((J‚áß‚Ä†) * œà‚á©2) $$ (i,j) = œà‚á©f $$ (i,j)" 
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1,2,3} ‚àß j=0" 
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def set_4 hermite_cnj_of_J by auto
  qed
next
  show "dim_row ((J‚áß‚Ä†) * œà‚á©2) = dim_row œà‚á©f" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp  
next
  show "dim_col ((J‚áß‚Ä†) * œà‚á©2) = dim_col œà‚á©f" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp  
qed

lemma (in prisoner) unit_vec_4_0_ket_is_state: 
  shows "state 2 |unit_vec 4 0‚ü©"
  using state_def cpx_vec_length_def ket_vec_def unit_vec_def by (auto simp add: set_4)

lemma cos_sin_squared_add_cpx: 
  "complex_of_real (cos (Œ≥/2)) * complex_of_real (cos (Œ≥/2)) -
   ùóÇ*complex_of_real (sin (Œ≥/2)) * (ùóÇ*complex_of_real (sin (Œ≥/2))) = 1"
    apply (auto simp add: algebra_simps)
    by (metis of_real_add of_real_hom.hom_one of_real_mult sin_cos_squared_add3)

lemma sin_cos_squared_add_cpx:
  "ùóÇ*complex_of_real (sin (Œ≥/2)) * (ùóÇ*complex_of_real (sin (Œ≥/2))) -
   complex_of_real (cos (Œ≥/2)) * complex_of_real (cos (Œ≥/2)) = -1"
    apply (auto simp add: algebra_simps)
    by (metis of_real_add of_real_hom.hom_one of_real_mult sin_cos_squared_add3)

lemma (in prisoner) J_cnj_times_J:
  shows "J‚áß‚Ä† * J = 1‚á©m 4"
proof
  fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row (1‚á©m 4)" and a1:"j < dim_col (1‚á©m 4)"
  then show "(J‚áß‚Ä† * J) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m 4 $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1,2,3} ‚àß j‚àà{0,1,2,3}" 
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def hermite_cnj_of_J set_4 cos_sin_squared_add_cpx by auto
  qed
next
  show "dim_row (J‚áß‚Ä† * J) = dim_row (1‚á©m 4)"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
next
  show "dim_col (J‚áß‚Ä† * J) = dim_col (1‚á©m 4)" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
qed

lemma (in prisoner) J_times_J_cnj:
  shows "J * (J‚áß‚Ä†) = 1‚á©m 4"
proof
  fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row (1‚á©m 4)" and a1:"j < dim_col (1‚á©m 4)"
  then show "(J * (J‚áß‚Ä†)) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m 4 $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1,2,3} ‚àß j‚àà{0,1,2,3}" 
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def hermite_cnj_of_J set_4 cos_sin_squared_add_cpx by auto
  qed
next
  show "dim_row (J * (J‚áß‚Ä†)) = dim_row (1‚á©m 4)"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
next
  show "dim_col (J * (J‚áß‚Ä†)) = dim_col (1‚á©m 4)"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
qed

lemma (in prisoner) J_is_gate:
  shows "gate 2 J"
proof
  show "dim_row J = 2‚áß2"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
  moreover show "square_mat J"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
  ultimately show "unitary J"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def unitary_def J_cnj_times_J J_times_J_cnj by auto
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) psi_one_is_state: 
  shows "state 2 œà‚á©1"
proof-
  have "state 2 (J * |unit_vec 4 0‚ü©)"
    using unit_vec_4_0_ket_is_state J_is_gate by auto
  then show ?thesis
    using psi_one by simp
qed

abbreviation (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©A_cnj :: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"U‚á©A_cnj ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 2 [[(exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A))*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2), sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2)],
                              [-sin(Œ∏‚á©A/2), (exp (ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©A))*cos(Œ∏‚á©A/2)]]"

abbreviation (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©B_cnj :: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"U‚á©B_cnj ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 2 [[(exp(-ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B))*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2), sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2)],
                              [-sin(Œ∏‚á©B/2), (exp(ùóÇ*œÜ‚á©B))*cos(Œ∏‚á©B/2)]]"

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) hermite_cnj_of_U‚á©A:
  shows "U‚á©A‚áß‚Ä† = U‚á©A_cnj"
proof
  fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row U‚á©A_cnj" and a1:"j < dim_col U‚á©A_cnj"
  then show "U‚á©A‚áß‚Ä† $$ (i,j) = U‚á©A_cnj $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1} ‚àß j‚àà{0,1}"
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def dagger_def exp_of_real_cnj exp_of_real_cnj2 by auto
  qed
next
  show "dim_row (U‚á©A‚áß‚Ä†) = dim_row U‚á©A_cnj"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
next
  show "dim_col (U‚á©A‚áß‚Ä†) = dim_col U‚á©A_cnj"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) hermite_cnj_of_U‚á©B:
  shows "U‚á©B‚áß‚Ä† = U‚á©B_cnj"
proof
  fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row U‚á©B_cnj" and a1:"j < dim_col U‚á©B_cnj"
  then show "U‚á©B‚áß‚Ä† $$ (i,j) = U‚á©B_cnj $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1} ‚àß j‚àà{0,1}"
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def dagger_def exp_of_real_cnj exp_of_real_cnj2 by auto
  qed
next
  show "dim_row (U‚á©B‚áß‚Ä†) = dim_row U‚á©B_cnj"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
next
  show "dim_col (U‚á©B‚áß‚Ä†) = dim_col U‚á©B_cnj"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
qed

lemma exp_sin_cos_squared_add:
  fixes x y :: real
  shows "exp (- (ùóÇ * x)) * cos (y) * (exp (ùóÇ * x) * cos (y)) + sin(y) * sin(y) = 1"
proof-
  have "exp (- (ùóÇ * x)) * cos (y) * (exp (ùóÇ * x) * cos (y)) = cos(y) * cos(y)"
    using exp_minus_inverse by (auto simp add: algebra_simps)
  then show ?thesis
    by (metis of_real_add of_real_hom.hom_one sin_cos_squared_add3)
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©A_cnj_times_U‚á©A:
  shows "U‚á©A‚áß‚Ä† * U‚á©A = 1‚á©m 2"
proof
  fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row (1‚á©m 2)" and a1:"j < dim_col (1‚á©m 2)"
  then show "(U‚á©A‚áß‚Ä† * U‚á©A) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m 2 $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1} ‚àß j‚àà{0,1}" 
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def cos_sin_squared_add_cpx hermite_cnj_of_U‚á©A exp_sin_cos_squared_add[of "œÜ‚á©A" "Œ∏‚á©A / 2"]
      by (auto simp add: set_2 algebra_simps)
  qed
next
  show "dim_row (U‚á©A‚áß‚Ä† * U‚á©A) = dim_row (1‚á©m 2)"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
next
  show "dim_col (U‚á©A‚áß‚Ä† * U‚á©A) = dim_col (1‚á©m 2)" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©A_times_U‚á©A_cnj:
  shows "U‚á©A * (U‚á©A‚áß‚Ä†) = 1‚á©m 2"
proof
  fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row (1‚á©m 2)" and a1:"j < dim_col (1‚á©m 2)"
  then show "(U‚á©A * (U‚á©A‚áß‚Ä†)) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m 2 $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1} ‚àß j‚àà{0,1}" 
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def cos_sin_squared_add_cpx hermite_cnj_of_U‚á©A exp_sin_cos_squared_add[of "œÜ‚á©A" "Œ∏‚á©A / 2"]
      by (auto simp add: set_2 algebra_simps)
  qed
next
  show "dim_row (U‚á©A * (U‚á©A‚áß‚Ä†)) = dim_row (1‚á©m 2)"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
next
  show "dim_col (U‚á©A * (U‚á©A‚áß‚Ä†)) = dim_col (1‚á©m 2)" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©B_cnj_times_U‚á©B:
  shows "U‚á©B‚áß‚Ä† * U‚á©B = 1‚á©m 2"
proof
  fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row (1‚á©m 2)" and a1:"j < dim_col (1‚á©m 2)"
  then show "(U‚á©B‚áß‚Ä† * U‚á©B) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m 2 $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1} ‚àß j‚àà{0,1}" 
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def cos_sin_squared_add_cpx hermite_cnj_of_U‚á©B exp_sin_cos_squared_add[of "œÜ‚á©B" "Œ∏‚á©B / 2"]
      by (auto simp add: set_2 algebra_simps)
  qed
next
  show "dim_row (U‚á©B‚áß‚Ä† * U‚á©B) = dim_row (1‚á©m 2)"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
next
  show "dim_col (U‚á©B‚áß‚Ä† * U‚á©B) = dim_col (1‚á©m 2)" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©B_times_U‚á©B_cnj:
  shows "U‚á©B * (U‚á©B‚áß‚Ä†) = 1‚á©m 2"
proof
  fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row (1‚á©m 2)" and a1:"j < dim_col (1‚á©m 2)"
  then show "(U‚á©B * (U‚á©B‚áß‚Ä†)) $$ (i,j) = 1‚á©m 2 $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1} ‚àß j‚àà{0,1}" 
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def cos_sin_squared_add_cpx hermite_cnj_of_U‚á©B exp_sin_cos_squared_add[of "œÜ‚á©B" "Œ∏‚á©B / 2"]
      by (auto simp add: set_2 algebra_simps)
  qed
next
  show "dim_row (U‚á©B * (U‚á©B‚áß‚Ä†)) = dim_row (1‚á©m 2)"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
next
  show "dim_col (U‚á©B * (U‚á©B‚áß‚Ä†)) = dim_col (1‚á©m 2)" 
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©A‚á©_is_gate:
  shows "gate 1 U‚á©A"
proof
  show "dim_row U‚á©A = 2^1"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
  moreover show "square_mat U‚á©A"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
  ultimately show "unitary U‚á©A"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def unitary_def U‚á©A_cnj_times_U‚á©A U‚á©A_times_U‚á©A_cnj by auto
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©B_is_gate:
  shows "gate 1 U‚á©B"
proof
  show "dim_row U‚á©B = 2^1"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
  moreover show "square_mat U‚á©B"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
  ultimately show "unitary U‚á©B"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def unitary_def U‚á©B_cnj_times_U‚á©B U‚á©B_times_U‚á©B_cnj by auto
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) U‚á©A‚á©B_is_gate:
  shows "gate 2 (U‚á©A ‚®Ç U‚á©B)"
proof-
  have "gate (1+1) (U‚á©A ‚®Ç U‚á©B)"
    using U‚á©A‚á©_is_gate U‚á©B_is_gate tensor_gate[of "1" "U‚á©A" "1" "U‚á©B"] by auto
  then show ?thesis
    by (auto simp add: numeral_2_eq_2)
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) psi_two_is_state:
  shows "state 2 œà‚á©2"
proof-
  have "state 2 ((U‚á©A ‚®Ç U‚á©B) * œà‚á©1)"
    using psi_one_is_state U‚á©A‚á©B_is_gate by auto
  then show ?thesis
    using psi_two by simp
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) J_cnj_is_gate:
  shows "gate 2 (J‚áß‚Ä†)"
proof
  show "dim_row (J‚áß‚Ä†) = 2‚áß2"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
  moreover show "square_mat (J‚áß‚Ä†)"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
  moreover have "(J‚áß‚Ä†)‚áß‚Ä† = J"
    using dagger_of_dagger_is_id by auto
  ultimately show "unitary (J‚áß‚Ä†)"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def unitary_def J_cnj_times_J J_times_J_cnj by auto
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) psi_f_is_state: 
  shows "state 2 œà‚á©f"
proof-
  have "state 2 ((J‚áß‚Ä†) * œà‚á©2)"
    using psi_two_is_state J_cnj_is_gate by auto
  then show ?thesis
    using psi_f by simp
qed

(* equation (1) in the paper *)
lemma (in strategic_space_2p) equation_one:
  shows "(J‚áß‚Ä†) * ((U‚á©A ‚®Ç U‚á©B) * (J * |unit_vec 4 0‚ü©)) = œà‚á©f"
  using psi_one psi_two psi_f by auto

abbreviation (in strategic_space_2p) prob00 :: "complex Matrix.mat ‚áí real" where
"prob00 v ‚â° if state 2 v then (cmod (v $$ (0,0)))‚áß2 else undefined"

abbreviation (in strategic_space_2p) prob01 :: "complex Matrix.mat ‚áí real" where
"prob01 v ‚â° if state 2 v then (cmod (v $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 else undefined"

abbreviation (in strategic_space_2p) prob10 :: "complex Matrix.mat ‚áí real" where
"prob10 v ‚â° if state 2 v then (cmod (v $$ (2,0)))‚áß2 else undefined"

abbreviation (in strategic_space_2p) prob11 :: "complex Matrix.mat ‚áí real" where
"prob11 v ‚â° if state 2 v then (cmod (v $$ (3,0)))‚áß2 else undefined"

definition (in strategic_space_2p) alice_payoff :: "real" where
"alice_payoff ‚â° 3 * (prob00 œà‚á©f) + 1 * (prob11 œà‚á©f) + 0 * (prob01 œà‚á©f) + 5 * (prob10 œà‚á©f)"

definition (in strategic_space_2p) bob_payoff :: "real" where
"bob_payoff ‚â° 3 * (prob00 œà‚á©f) + 1 * (prob11 œà‚á©f) + 5 * (prob01 œà‚á©f) + 0 * (prob10 œà‚á©f)"

definition (in strategic_space_2p) is_nash_eq :: "bool" where
"is_nash_eq ‚â° 
(‚àÄtA pA. strategic_space_2p Œ≥ tA pA Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B ‚ü∂ 
    alice_payoff ‚â• strategic_space_2p.alice_payoff Œ≥ tA pA Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B) 
‚àß
(‚àÄtB pB. strategic_space_2p Œ≥ Œ∏‚á©A œÜ‚á©A tB pB ‚ü∂ 
    bob_payoff ‚â• strategic_space_2p.bob_payoff Œ≥ Œ∏‚á©A œÜ‚á©A tB pB)"

definition (in strategic_space_2p) is_pareto_opt :: "bool" where
"is_pareto_opt ‚â° ‚àÄtA pA tB pB. strategic_space_2p Œ≥ tA pA tB pB ‚ü∂
((strategic_space_2p.alice_payoff Œ≥ tA pA tB pB > alice_payoff ‚ü∂ 
  strategic_space_2p.bob_payoff Œ≥ tA pA tB pB < bob_payoff) ‚àß
 (strategic_space_2p.bob_payoff Œ≥ tA pA tB pB > bob_payoff ‚ü∂ 
  strategic_space_2p.alice_payoff Œ≥ tA pA tB pB < alice_payoff))"

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) sum_of_prob:
  fixes v :: "complex Matrix.mat"
  assumes "state 2 v"
  shows "(prob00 v) + (prob11 v) + (prob01 v) + (prob10 v) = 1"
proof-
  have "(prob00 v) + (prob11 v) + (prob01 v) + (prob10 v) = 
        (cmod (v $$ (0,0)))‚áß2 + (cmod (v $$ (1,0)))‚áß2 + (cmod (v $$ (2,0)))‚áß2 + (cmod (v $$ (3,0)))‚áß2"
    using assms by auto
  then show ?thesis
    using state_def assms cpx_vec_length_def by (auto simp add: set_4)
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) sum_payoff_le_6:
  fixes tA pA tB pB :: real
  shows "alice_payoff + bob_payoff ‚â§ 6"
proof-
  have "alice_payoff + bob_payoff = 6 * (prob00 œà‚á©f) + 2 * (prob11 œà‚á©f) + 5 * (prob01 œà‚á©f) + 5 * (prob10 œà‚á©f)"
    using alice_payoff_def bob_payoff_def psi_f_is_state by auto
  then have "alice_payoff + bob_payoff ‚â§ 6 * ((prob00 œà‚á©f) + (prob11 œà‚á©f) + (prob01 œà‚á©f) + (prob10 œà‚á©f))"
    using psi_f_is_state by (auto simp add: algebra_simps)
  moreover have "(prob00 œà‚á©f) + (prob11 œà‚á©f) + (prob01 œà‚á©f) + (prob10 œà‚á©f) = 1"
    using sum_of_prob[of "œà‚á©f"] psi_f_is_state by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by auto
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) coop_is_pareto_opt:
  assumes "alice_payoff = 3 ‚àß bob_payoff = 3"
  shows "is_pareto_opt"
  using is_pareto_opt_def strategic_space_2p.sum_payoff_le_6 assms by fastforce


subsection ‚ÄπThe Separable Case‚Ä∫

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) separable_case_CC: (* both player cooperate *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = 0"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = 0 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0 ‚ü∂ alice_payoff = 3 ‚àß bob_payoff = 3"
  using alice_payoff_def bob_payoff_def cos_sin_squared_add_cpx psi_f_is_state by auto

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) separable_case_DD: (* both player defect *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = 0"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi ‚ü∂ alice_payoff = 1 ‚àß bob_payoff = 1"
  using alice_payoff_def bob_payoff_def cos_sin_squared_add_cpx psi_f_is_state by auto

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) separable_case_DC: (* Alice defects, and Bob cooperates *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = 0"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0 ‚ü∂ alice_payoff = 5 ‚àß bob_payoff = 0"
  using alice_payoff_def bob_payoff_def sin_cos_squared_add_cpx psi_f_is_state by auto

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) separable_alice_payoff_D‚á©B: 
(* Alice's payoff in the separable case given that Bob defects *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = 0" and "œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi"
  shows "alice_payoff ‚â§ 1"
  using alice_payoff_def assms sin_squared_le_one psi_f_is_state by auto

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) separable_bob_payoff_D‚á©A:
(* Bob's payoff in the separable case given that Alice defects *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = 0" and "œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi"
  shows "bob_payoff ‚â§ 1"
  using bob_payoff_def assms sin_squared_le_one psi_f_is_state by auto

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) separable_case_DD_alice_opt:
  assumes "Œ≥ = 0" and "œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi"
  shows "‚ãÄtA pA. strategic_space_2p Œ≥ tA pA Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B ‚ü∂ strategic_space_2p.alice_payoff Œ≥ tA pA Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B ‚â§ alice_payoff"
proof
  fix tA pA assume "strategic_space_2p Œ≥ tA pA Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B"
  then show "strategic_space_2p.alice_payoff Œ≥ tA pA Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B ‚â§ alice_payoff"
    using separable_case_DD strategic_space_2p.separable_alice_payoff_D‚á©B assms by auto
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) separable_case_DD_bob_opt:
  assumes "Œ≥ = 0" and "œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi"
  shows "‚ãÄtB pB. strategic_space_2p Œ≥ Œ∏‚á©A œÜ‚á©A tB pB ‚ü∂ strategic_space_2p.bob_payoff Œ≥ Œ∏‚á©A œÜ‚á©A tB pB ‚â§ bob_payoff"
proof
  fix tB pB assume "strategic_space_2p Œ≥ Œ∏‚á©A œÜ‚á©A tB pB"
  then show "strategic_space_2p.bob_payoff Œ≥ Œ∏‚á©A œÜ‚á©A tB pB ‚â§ bob_payoff"
    using separable_case_DD strategic_space_2p.separable_bob_payoff_D‚á©A assms by auto
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) separable_case_DD_is_nash_eq:
  assumes "Œ≥ = 0"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi ‚ü∂ is_nash_eq"
  using is_nash_eq_def separable_case_DD_alice_opt separable_case_DD_bob_opt assms by auto

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) separable_case_CC_is_not_nash_eq:
  assumes "Œ≥ = 0"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = 0 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0 ‚ü∂ ¬¨ is_nash_eq"
proof
  assume asm:"œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = 0 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0"
  then have f0:"strategic_space_2p Œ≥ pi 0 Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B"
    using strategic_space_2p_def strategic_space_2p_axioms_def prisoner_def asm by (simp add: assms)
  then have "strategic_space_2p.alice_payoff Œ≥ pi 0 Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B = 5"
    using strategic_space_2p.separable_case_DC assms asm by blast
  moreover have "alice_payoff = 3"
    using separable_case_CC assms asm by blast
  ultimately have "strategic_space_2p Œ≥ pi 0 Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B ‚àß strategic_space_2p.alice_payoff Œ≥ pi 0 Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B > alice_payoff"
    using f0 by simp
  then show "¬¨is_nash_eq"
    using is_nash_eq_def by fastforce
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) separable_case_CC_is_pareto_optimal:
  assumes "Œ≥ = 0"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = 0 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0 ‚ü∂ is_pareto_opt"
  using coop_is_pareto_opt separable_case_CC assms by auto


subsection ‚ÄπThe Maximally Entangled Case‚Ä∫

lemma exp_to_sin:
  fixes x:: real
  shows "exp (ùóÇ * x) - exp (-(ùóÇ * x)) = 2 * ùóÇ * (sin x)"
  using exp_of_real exp_of_real_inv by simp

lemma exp_to_cos:
  fixes x:: real
  shows "exp (ùóÇ * x) + exp (-(ùóÇ * x)) = 2 * (cos x)"
  using exp_of_real exp_of_real_inv by simp

lemma cmod_real_prod_squared: 
  fixes x y:: real
  shows "(cmod (complex_of_real x * complex_of_real y))‚áß2 = x‚áß2 * y‚áß2"
  by (simp add: norm_mult power_mult_distrib)

lemma quantum_payoff_simp:
  fixes x y:: real
  shows "3 * (cmod (complex_of_real (sin x) * complex_of_real (cos y)))‚áß2 +
         (cmod (complex_of_real (cos x) * complex_of_real (cos y)))‚áß2 = 
         2 * (sin x)‚áß2 * (cos y)‚áß2 + (cos y)‚áß2"
proof-
  have "3 * (sin x)‚áß2 * (cos y)‚áß2 + (cos x)‚áß2 * (cos y)‚áß2 = 
        (2 * (sin x)‚áß2 * (cos y)‚áß2) + ((sin x)‚áß2 + (cos x)‚áß2) * (cos y)‚áß2" 
    by (auto simp add: algebra_simps simp del: sin_cos_squared_add2)
  then show ?thesis
    by (simp add: cmod_real_prod_squared power_mult_distrib)
qed

lemma quantum_payoff_le_3: 
  fixes x y:: real
  shows "2 * (sin x)‚áß2 * (cos y)‚áß2 + (cos y)‚áß2 ‚â§ 3"
proof-
  have "(sin x)‚áß2 * (cos y)‚áß2 ‚â§ 1" by (simp add: sin_squared_le_one cos_squared_le_one mult_le_one)
  then have "2 * (sin x)‚áß2 * (cos y)‚áß2 ‚â§ 2" by simp
  moreover have "(cos y)‚áß2 ‚â§ 1" 
    using cos_squared_le_one[of "y"] by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma sqrt_two_squared_cpx: "complex_of_real (sqrt 2) * complex_of_real (sqrt 2) = 2"
  by (metis mult_2_right numeral_Bit0 of_real_mult of_real_numeral real_sqrt_four real_sqrt_mult)

lemma hidden_sqrt_two_squared_cpx: "complex_of_real (sqrt 2) * (complex_of_real (sqrt 2) * x) / 4 = x/2"
  using sqrt_two_squared_cpx by (auto simp add: algebra_simps)

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_DD:
(* both players defects in the maximally entangled case *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi ‚ü∂ alice_payoff = 1 ‚àß bob_payoff = 1"
  using alice_payoff_def bob_payoff_def cos_sin_squared_add_cpx psi_f_is_state
  by auto

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_QQ:
(* both players play the move Q in the maximally entangled case *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = 0 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0 ‚ü∂ alice_payoff = 3 ‚àß bob_payoff = 3"
  using alice_payoff_def bob_payoff_def sin_cos_squared_add_cpx exp_of_half_pi exp_of_minus_half_pi psi_f_is_state
  by auto

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_QD:
(* Alice plays the move Q, and Bob defects in the maximally entangled case *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = 0 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi ‚ü∂ alice_payoff = 5 ‚àß bob_payoff = 0"
  using alice_payoff_def bob_payoff_def cos_sin_squared_add_cpx exp_of_half_pi exp_of_minus_half_pi 
        psi_f_is_state sqrt_two_squared_cpx
  by (auto simp add: assms algebra_simps sin_45 cos_45)

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_alice_payoff_Q‚á©B:
(* Alice's payoff in the maximally entangled case given that Bob plays the move Q *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2"
  shows "œÜ‚á©B = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0 ‚ü∂ alice_payoff ‚â§ 3"
proof
  assume asm:"œÜ‚á©B = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0"
  have "œà‚á©f $$ (0,0) = -(sin œÜ‚á©A) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©A/2))"
  proof-
    have "œà‚á©f $$ (0,0) = ùóÇ * (sqrt 2/2) * (sqrt 2/2) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©A/2)) * exp (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©A) +
                        ùóÇ * (sqrt 2/2) * (sqrt 2/2) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©A/2)) * -exp (-(ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©A))"
      using mat_of_cols_list_def asm assms exp_of_half_pi exp_of_minus_half_pi
      by (auto simp add: sin_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] cos_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] algebra_simps)
    then have "œà‚á©f $$ (0,0) = ùóÇ * (sqrt 2/2) * (sqrt 2/2) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©A/2)) * (exp (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©A) - exp (-(ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©A)))"
      by (auto simp add: algebra_simps)
    then have "œà‚á©f $$ (0,0) = ùóÇ * (cos (Œ∏‚á©A/2)) * (1/2) * (exp (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©A) - exp (-(ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©A)))"
      using sqrt_two_squared_cpx by (auto simp add: algebra_simps)
    then show ?thesis
      using exp_to_sin by (simp add: algebra_simps)
  qed
  moreover have "œà‚á©f $$ (1,0) = sin (Œ∏‚á©A/2)"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def asm assms exp_of_half_pi exp_of_minus_half_pi sqrt_two_squared_cpx
    by (auto simp add: sin_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] cos_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"])
  moreover have "œà‚á©f $$ (2,0) = 0"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def asm assms exp_of_half_pi exp_of_minus_half_pi sqrt_two_squared_cpx
    by (auto simp add: sin_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] cos_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] algebra_simps)
  moreover have "œà‚á©f $$ (3,0) = (cos œÜ‚á©A) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©A/2))"
  proof-
    have "œà‚á©f $$ (3,0) = exp (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©A) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©A/2)) * (sqrt 2/2) * (sqrt 2/2) +
                        exp (- (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©A)) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©A/2)) * (sqrt 2/2) * (sqrt 2/2)"
      using mat_of_cols_list_def asm assms exp_of_half_pi exp_of_minus_half_pi
      by (auto simp add: sin_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] cos_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] algebra_simps)
    then have "œà‚á©f $$ (3,0) = (exp (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©A) + exp (-(ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©A))) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©A/2)) * (sqrt 2/2) * (sqrt 2/2)"
      by (auto simp add: algebra_simps)
    then have "œà‚á©f $$ (3,0) = (exp (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©A) + exp (-(ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©A))) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©A/2)) * (1/2)"
      using sqrt_two_squared_cpx hidden_sqrt_two_squared_cpx by (auto simp add: algebra_simps)
    then show ?thesis
      using exp_to_cos by (simp add: algebra_simps)
  qed
  ultimately show "alice_payoff ‚â§ 3"
  using alice_payoff_def psi_f_is_state quantum_payoff_simp quantum_payoff_le_3 
  by auto
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_bob_payoff_Q‚á©A:
(* Bob's payoff in the maximally entangled case given that Alice plays the move Q *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = 0 ‚ü∂ bob_payoff ‚â§ 3"
proof
  assume asm:"œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = 0"
  have "œà‚á©f $$ (0,0) = -(sin œÜ‚á©B) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©B/2))"
  proof-
    have "œà‚á©f $$ (0,0) = ùóÇ * (sqrt 2/2) * (sqrt 2/2) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©B/2)) * exp (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©B) +
                        ùóÇ * (sqrt 2/2) * (sqrt 2/2) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©B/2)) * -exp (-(ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©B))"
      using mat_of_cols_list_def asm assms exp_of_half_pi exp_of_minus_half_pi
      by (auto simp add: sin_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] cos_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] algebra_simps)
    then have "œà‚á©f $$ (0,0) = ùóÇ * (sqrt 2/2) * (sqrt 2/2) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©B/2)) * (exp (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©B) - exp (-(ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©B)))"
      by (auto simp add: algebra_simps)
    then have "œà‚á©f $$ (0,0) = ùóÇ * (cos (Œ∏‚á©B/2)) * (1/2) * (exp (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©B) - exp (-(ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©B)))"
      using sqrt_two_squared_cpx by (auto simp add: algebra_simps)
    then show ?thesis
      using exp_to_sin by (simp add: algebra_simps)
  qed
  moreover have "œà‚á©f $$ (1,0) = 0"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def asm assms exp_of_half_pi exp_of_minus_half_pi sqrt_two_squared_cpx
    by (auto simp add: sin_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] cos_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] algebra_simps)
  moreover have "œà‚á©f $$ (2,0) = sin (Œ∏‚á©B/2)"
    using mat_of_cols_list_def asm assms exp_of_half_pi exp_of_minus_half_pi sqrt_two_squared_cpx
    by (auto simp add: sin_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] cos_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] algebra_simps)
  moreover have "œà‚á©f $$ (3,0) = (cos œÜ‚á©B) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©B/2))"
  proof-
    have "œà‚á©f $$ (3,0) = exp (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©B) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©B/2)) * (sqrt 2/2) * (sqrt 2/2) +
                        exp (- (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©B)) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©B/2)) * (sqrt 2/2) * (sqrt 2/2)"
      using mat_of_cols_list_def asm assms exp_of_half_pi exp_of_minus_half_pi
      by (auto simp add: sin_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] cos_of_quarter_pi[of "Œ≥"] algebra_simps)
    then have "œà‚á©f $$ (3,0) = (exp (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©B) + exp (-(ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©B))) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©B/2)) * (sqrt 2/2) * (sqrt 2/2)"
      by (auto simp add: algebra_simps)
    then have "œà‚á©f $$ (3,0) = (exp (ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©B) + exp (-(ùóÇ * œÜ‚á©B))) * (cos (Œ∏‚á©B/2)) * (1/2)"
      using sqrt_two_squared_cpx hidden_sqrt_two_squared_cpx by (auto simp add: algebra_simps)
    then show ?thesis
      using exp_to_cos by (simp add: algebra_simps)
  qed
  ultimately show "bob_payoff ‚â§ 3"
  using bob_payoff_def psi_f_is_state quantum_payoff_simp quantum_payoff_le_3 
  by auto
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_DD_is_not_nash_eq:
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi ‚ü∂ ¬¨is_nash_eq"
proof
  assume asm:"œÜ‚á©A = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi"
  then have f0:"strategic_space_2p Œ≥ 0 (pi/2) Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B"
    using strategic_space_2p_def strategic_space_2p_axioms_def prisoner_def asm by (simp add: assms)
  then have "strategic_space_2p.alice_payoff Œ≥ 0 (pi/2) Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B = 5"
    using strategic_space_2p.max_entangled_QD assms asm by blast
  moreover have "alice_payoff = 1"
    using max_entangled_DD assms asm by blast
  ultimately have "strategic_space_2p Œ≥ 0 (pi/2) Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B ‚àß strategic_space_2p.alice_payoff Œ≥ 0 (pi/2) Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B > alice_payoff"
    using f0 by simp
  then show "¬¨is_nash_eq"
    using is_nash_eq_def by fastforce
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_alice_opt:
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2" and "œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = 0 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0"
  shows "‚ãÄtA pA. strategic_space_2p Œ≥ tA pA Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B ‚ü∂ strategic_space_2p.alice_payoff Œ≥ tA pA Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B ‚â§ alice_payoff"
proof
  fix tA pA assume "strategic_space_2p Œ≥ tA pA Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B"
  then have "strategic_space_2p.alice_payoff Œ≥ tA pA Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B ‚â§ 3"
    using strategic_space_2p.max_entangled_alice_payoff_Q‚á©B assms by blast
  moreover have "alice_payoff = 3"
    using max_entangled_QQ assms by blast
  ultimately show "strategic_space_2p.alice_payoff Œ≥ tA pA Œ∏‚á©B œÜ‚á©B ‚â§ alice_payoff"
    by simp
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_bob_opt:
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2" and "œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = 0 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0"
  shows "‚ãÄtB pB. strategic_space_2p Œ≥ Œ∏‚á©A œÜ‚á©A tB pB ‚ü∂ strategic_space_2p.bob_payoff Œ≥ Œ∏‚á©A œÜ‚á©A tB pB ‚â§ bob_payoff"
proof
  fix tB pB assume "strategic_space_2p Œ≥ Œ∏‚á©A œÜ‚á©A tB pB"
  then have "strategic_space_2p.bob_payoff Œ≥ Œ∏‚á©A œÜ‚á©A tB pB ‚â§ 3"
    using strategic_space_2p.max_entangled_bob_payoff_Q‚á©A assms by blast
  moreover have "bob_payoff = 3"
    using max_entangled_QQ assms by blast
  ultimately show "strategic_space_2p.bob_payoff Œ≥ Œ∏‚á©A œÜ‚á©A tB pB ‚â§ bob_payoff"
    by simp
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_QQ_is_nash_eq:
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = 0 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0 ‚ü∂ is_nash_eq"
  using max_entangled_alice_opt max_entangled_bob_opt is_nash_eq_def assms by blast

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_QQ_is_pareto_optimal:
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = 0 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0 ‚ü∂ is_pareto_opt"
  using coop_is_pareto_opt max_entangled_QQ assms by blast


subsection ‚ÄπThe Unfair Strategy Case‚Ä∫

lemma half_sqrt_two_squared: "2 * (sqrt 2 / 2)‚áß2 = 1"
  by (auto simp add: power2_eq_square)

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_MD:
(* Alice plays the "miracle move", and Bob plays the classical defect move in the maximally entangled case *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi ‚ü∂ alice_payoff = 3 ‚àß bob_payoff = 1/2"
proof
  assume asm:"œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi"
  show "alice_payoff = 3 ‚àß bob_payoff = 1/2"
    using alice_payoff_def bob_payoff_def sqrt_two_squared_cpx half_sqrt_two_squared
          exp_of_half_pi[of "pi/2"] exp_of_minus_half_pi[of "pi/2"] psi_f_is_state
    by (auto simp add: asm assms sin_45 cos_45 algebra_simps)
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_MC:
(* Alice plays the "miracle move", and Bob plays the classical defect move in the maximally entangled case *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0 ‚ü∂ alice_payoff = 3 ‚àß bob_payoff = 1/2"
proof
  assume asm:"œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = 0"
  show "alice_payoff = 3 ‚àß bob_payoff = 1/2"
    using alice_payoff_def bob_payoff_def sqrt_two_squared_cpx half_sqrt_two_squared
          exp_of_half_pi[of "pi/2"] exp_of_minus_half_pi[of "pi/2"] psi_f_is_state
    by (auto simp add: asm assms sin_45 cos_45 algebra_simps)
qed

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) max_entangled_MH:
(* Alice plays the "miracle move", and Bob plays the classical half move in the maximally entangled case *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi/2 ‚ü∂ alice_payoff = 1 ‚àß bob_payoff = 1"
proof
  assume asm:"œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©B = pi/2"
  show "alice_payoff = 1 ‚àß bob_payoff = 1"
    using alice_payoff_def bob_payoff_def sqrt_two_squared_cpx half_sqrt_two_squared
          exp_of_half_pi[of "pi/2"] exp_of_minus_half_pi[of "pi/2"] psi_f_is_state
    by (auto simp add: asm assms sin_45 cos_45 algebra_simps)
qed

(* This is the definition of M in equation (9) *)
abbreviation M :: "complex Matrix.mat" where
"M ‚â° mat_of_cols_list 2 [[ùóÇ * sqrt(2)/2, -1 * sqrt(2)/2],
                          [1 * sqrt(2)/2, -ùóÇ * sqrt(2)/2]]"

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) M_correct:
  assumes "œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = pi/2"
  shows "U‚á©A = M"
proof
  show "dim_row U‚á©A = dim_row M" using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
  show "dim_col U‚á©A = dim_col M" using mat_of_cols_list_def by simp
  fix i j assume a0:"i < dim_row M" and a1:"j < dim_col M"
  then show "U‚á©A $$ (i,j) = M $$ (i,j)"
  proof-
    have "i‚àà{0,1} ‚àß j‚àà{0,1}" 
      using a0 a1 mat_of_cols_list_def by auto
    thus ?thesis
      using mat_of_cols_list_def exp_of_half_pi[of "pi/2"] exp_of_minus_half_pi[of "pi/2"]
      by (auto simp add: assms sin_45 cos_45)
  qed
qed

lemma hidden_sqrt_two_squared_cpx2:
  fixes x y :: complex
  shows "(sqrt 2) * ((sqrt 2) * (x * y)) / 2 = x * y"
  using sqrt_two_squared_cpx by auto

lemma (in strategic_space_2p) unfair_strategy_no_benefit:
(* Two players' payoffs in the maximally entangled case given that Alice plays a quantum move and Bob 
plays a classical move with the same Œ∏ *)
  assumes "Œ≥ = pi/2"
  shows "œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = Œ∏‚á©B ‚ü∂ alice_payoff = 1 ‚àß bob_payoff = 1"
proof
  assume asm:"œÜ‚á©A = pi/2 ‚àß œÜ‚á©B = 0 ‚àß Œ∏‚á©A = Œ∏‚á©B"
  have "œà‚á©f $$ (0,0) = 0"
    using exp_of_half_pi[of "pi/2"] exp_of_minus_half_pi[of "pi/2"]
    by (auto simp add: asm assms sin_45 cos_45 algebra_simps)
  moreover have "œà‚á©f $$ (1,0) = 0"
    using exp_of_half_pi[of "pi/2"] exp_of_minus_half_pi[of "pi/2"]
    by (auto simp add: asm assms sin_45 cos_45 algebra_simps)
  moreover have "œà‚á©f $$ (2,0) = 0"
    using exp_of_half_pi[of "pi/2"] exp_of_minus_half_pi[of "pi/2"]
    by (auto simp add: asm assms sin_45 cos_45 hidden_sqrt_two_squared_cpx2 algebra_simps)
  moreover have "œà‚á©f $$ (3,0) = 1"
    using exp_of_half_pi[of "pi/2"] exp_of_minus_half_pi[of "pi/2"] cos_sin_squared_add_cpx
    by (auto simp add: asm assms sin_45 cos_45 hidden_sqrt_two_squared_cpx2 algebra_simps)
  ultimately show "alice_payoff = 1 ‚àß bob_payoff = 1"
    using alice_payoff_def bob_payoff_def psi_f_is_state
    by auto
qed
